* Curiosity and interest in exploring emerging technologies such as Microsoft Fabric, vector databases, and AI integrations.
* Leadership capability and the ability to guide best practices across data initiatives.



  





 Additional Requirements:
 



  




* **On-site availability in Sweden (mandatory).**
* Fluency in
 **English.**



  





 If you’re interested in this job please send your CV in English to daniela.adao@decskill.com with reference “DA / Lead”
 



  





*Decskill is committed to equality and non-discrimination with all our talents. We recruit and promote talent, based on diversity and inclusion, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, race, nationality or any other form of discrimination incompatible with the dignity of the human being.*

title: Software Engineer
description:
**If you want to work with automation at scale, build tools that internal teams rely on daily, and solve real, impactful engineering problems across hardware and software, this is the right place!** 




  





**ABOUT US** 




 Toptracer Technologies have users and viewers all over the world. Our mission is to help people enjoy the wonderful game of golf even more by tracing contributions to TV and gamification to ranges. Our range technology is used in 38 countries and the broadcast is aired over 270 times yearly. All of our products are developed, tested and deployed from our R&D office in Danderyd, Stockholm.
 



  





**THE TEAM** 




 Our mission is to systematically automate and orchestrate range systems at scale, enabling internal teams to operate thousands of servers with high reliability and minimal manual intervention.
 



  





 We build and maintain the tooling that makes this possible — from provisioning software to monitoring large, distributed environments — ensuring that our ranges run efficiently, predictably, and with strong observability.
 



  





 Take the chance to leave your mark on the software architecture of an innovative tech company in a unique part of the tech field, in a team with diverse expertise who are passionate about building smart software.
 



  





**THE ROLE** 




 The team is now looking for a Software Engineer. With a broad background in software development, you will be driving technical decisions within the team and taking an active part in the company’s overall architectural and strategic discussions around ensuring scalability and enabling growth. Day-to-day you will be writing code with the team.
 



  





**What Makes This Role Unique** 




 Most companies manage a handful of servers — we manage thousands. The challenge and reward lie in building systems that reliably orchestrate massive, distributed environments. You’ll work on tools that power release workflows, regression testing, and large-scale automated deployments used across the entire organization. If you want to work with automation at scale, build tools that internal teams rely on daily, and solve real, impactful engineering problems across hardware and software, this is the right place.
 



  





**HOW WE WORK** 



* Weekly pair/mob programming sessions for alignment and shared decision-making.
* Regular demos to stakeholders to gather feedback early.
* Pull requests shared in team chat for quick review loops.
* Technical decisions discussed and agreed upon in mob sessions.
* A dedicated third-line support rotation for daily operational support.



  





**TECH STACK FOCUS** 




 Kubernetes platform with thousands of clusters
 



 Python for backend and general application development
 



 Developing for Linux environments
 



  





**POSSIBILITIES** 



* Develop and maintain tools that orchestrate and manage thousands of range systems.
* Ensure servers can be provisioned, configured, and managed effortlessly, supported by robust internal tooling.
* Build and evolve monitoring and observability tools that give real-time insight into software running across all ranges.
* Provide release management and regression test environments relied on by many internal teams.
* Work closely with hardware-adjacent software (servers, screens, cameras) and Linux-based environments
* And of course, playing golf!



  





**WE BELIEVE YOU HAVE** 



* Experience in backend programming with Python
* Experience in building Kubernetes platforms
* Several years of developing for Linux environments
* Several years of experience and a highly collaborative mindset.
* Great knowledge sharing and have strong abilities in coaching the other team members in order for the team to best solve technical challenges that are presented to them, together.
* Experience in deploying and maintaining cloud-based and distributed systems
* Understanding of large systems and how different components integrate



  





  





**MORE ABOUT TOPTRACER** 




  





**Workplace** 




  





 We value fully engaged associates that come to work because they enjoy their work and the colleagues they have. We strive to create a diverse and inclusive work environment where everybody can reach their full potential. We provide opportunities for all colleagues to develop internally and to meet each other. We have a strong commitment and dedication at Toptracer. That comes from the activities and moments we share together and the product we are developing.
 



  





 In addition to that, our technology is unique and world-leading which makes the journey extra exciting. We create a product that encourages people to be outside and get activated which enables a healthier lifestyle. As a colleague at Toptracer, you can either go to a range nearby your home to experience the product you have developed or just turn on the TV to see it in the biggest golf tournaments.
 



  





**Culture** 




 Our culture is driven by our mission to create moments that matter for everyone and our values for Caring, One Team, Fun, Excellence and Edgy Spirit. If you want to learn more about them visit: Core Values | Topgolf.
 



  





**Activities** 



* Morning Fikas
* After-work
* Pair/Mob programming
* Conference
* Dart
* Gym sessions
* Table-tennis
* Golf simulator
* Golf tournaments



  





**Benefits** 



* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and projects.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment.
* Professional development and growth opportunities.
* A hybrid work environment with the primary workplace at our cozy and welcoming office in Mörby Centrum, Danderyd.
* And of course, play golf!



  





 The position is permanent and full-time, located at our office in Danderyd. Hit the link at the bottom of the page to read more about the team. We hope to hear from you soon!
 



  





**Social media:** 




 https://vimeo.com/339546469
 



 https://www.toptracer.com/
 



 https://careers.toptracer.com
 



 https://www.instagram.com/toptracer/?hl=sv

title: Marketing Manager B2B | Business & Retail Banking
description:
Drive commercial growth and digital excellence across SEB’s corporate market.
   

  

 As Corporate Marketing Manager, you will play a central role in driving SEB’s commercial performance within the corporate segment. You will own and lead the overall marketing and commercial strategy for corporate customers, with a strong focus on demand generation, digital growth and sales performance across SEB’s digital ecosystem.
   

  

 This role combines strategic leadership with hands-on commercial responsibility and is key to ensuring SEB stays proactive, competitive and consistently delivers on ambitious growth and sales targets in the corporate market.
   

  

**About The Role**
**Own commercial performance**
* Own and drive commercial and sales-related objectives for SEB’s corporate market, with clear responsibility for target setting, follow-up and continuous optimisation
* Ensure transparency and structure in performance management across the full funnel – from awareness and demand generation to lead conversion and long-term customer relationships
* Identify opportunities, risks and gaps early, and act proactively to secure target fulfilment


**Lead corporate marketing and sales strategy**
* Define and drive the overarching marketing and sales strategy for corporate customers, aligned with SEB’s business priorities and growth ambitions
* Ensure strong visibility, relevance and competitiveness across digital and physical touchpoints
* Balance long-term relationship building brand strength


**Drive execution through leadership and collaboration**
* Transform, lead and develop a high-performing organisation spanning corporate marketing, content, lead generation, performance optimisation, analytics and campaign execution
* Translate strategy into clear priorities, initiatives and measurable outcomes
* Collaborate closely with Products, Digital Channels, Sales Enablement and Customer Management to ensure aligned priorities and frictionless customer journeys across advisory and digital channels


**To Thrive In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* Extensive experience in B2B marketing management - especially digital, commercial leadership, preferably in a complex, customer-centric organisation
* Strong understanding of how digital channels contribute to sales performance and growth
* A can do attitude and a sense-of urgency mindset
* Proven ability to set ambitious goals, follow up results and drive continuous improvement
* Experience leading and developing teams, with a clear focus on performance and accountability. You lead by example and believe in a positive and action oriented leadership
* Strong business acumen and an analytical mindset, with the ability to act on insights and data
* The ability to stay ahead, anticipate market changes and act proactively
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to influence across organisational boundaries


 This role is pivotal in shaping SEB’s corporate market growth and commercial performance.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* A strategically important leadership role within SEB’s Business & Retail Banking division
* The opportunity to own and drive growth for SEB’s corporate market
* A collaborative, high-trust culture with strong focus on responsibility and empowerment
* The ability to shape how SEB works with corporate marketing, demand generation and commercial optimisation going forward


**Ready to join?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial to our future success. We strive to foster an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved – regardless of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than 2026-03-06.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position, please contact Johan Hagegård, johan.hagegard@seb.se
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks. This process may include identity verification, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, random drug testing may also apply.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, which means this position may be filled through internal redeployment.

title: Informationsförvaltare med fokus på masterdata och handläggning
description:
Vill du bidra till en välfungerande hälso- och sjukvård genom att säkerställa att rätt information finns på rätt plats? Vi söker dig som drivs av ordning, struktur och vill vara med på vår resa mot en ännu bättre informationsförsörjning.
   

  





**Om rollen**




 I rollen som informationsförvaltare hos oss får du en nyckelposition där din noggrannhet direkt påverkar hur vårdkontakter rapporteras och ersätts. Du blir en del av hälso- och sjukvårdsförvaltningen där ditt arbete bidrar till att skapa samhällsnytta på riktigt.
   

  





 Tjänsten är en kombinationsroll där du initialt kommer att lägga stort fokus på handläggning av kombikakoder, för att över tid ta ett större ansvar även inom masterdataförvaltning.
   

  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter**




 Arbetet är både operativt och utvecklingsorienterat. Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter inkluderar:
 


* Handläggning & Registervård: Skapa och uppdatera masterdata, koder och relationer för vårdgivare och avtal i system som Kodservern och MDM-plattformen.
* Kvalitetssäkring: Arbeta strukturerat med att underhålla datakvalitet, identifiera avvikelser och genomföra eller initiera rättningar.
* Stöd & Utbildning: För de informationsmängder där det finns externa producenter fungerar du som ett stöd, utbildar och säkerställer att regler för informationen efterlevs.
* Samverkan: Du arbetar självständigt med dina ärenden men representerar även ditt område i processteam och arbetsgrupper för att bidra till verksamhetens utveckling.



**Vem är du?**




 Vi söker dig som trivs i en roll som kräver stort fokus på detaljer utan att tappa det större sammanhanget. Du förstår hur data i ett system interagerar med andra tjänster och it-system. Viktigt att du har ett intresse av hur informationen du arbetar med används i och påverkar verksamheternas arbete.
   

  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Relevant eftergymnasial utbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet som vi bedömer som likvärdig.
* Förståelse för hur data i ett system interagerar med andra tjänster och it-system.
* Erfarenhet av administrativt arbete och vana av att arbeta i olika typer av it-system.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska (tal och skrift) samt goda kunskaper i Office-paketet.



 Som person är du: Strukturerad, noggrann och analytisk. Du har en god förmåga att planera ditt eget arbete och driva dina ärenden framåt självständigt. Eftersom rollen innebär kontakter både internt och externt är det viktigt att du är kommunikativ och har lätt för att samarbeta. Du har goda kunskaper i svenska i både tal och skrift.
   

  





**Meriterande erfarenheter:** 



* Erfarenhet av arbete inom Region Stockholm.
* Kunskap om kombikakoder och relaterade informationsmängder inom hälso- och sjukvård.
* Erfarenhet av systemen Kodservern, MDM-plattformen, EK och/eller DILA-portalen.
* Erfarenhet av arbete med datakvalitet inom områdena Avtal, Enhet och Person.
* Erfarenhet av avtalsarbete inom Region Stockholm.
* Erfarenhet av ärendehantering.



****Vårt erbjudande****




 Att arbeta på enheten Regionala informationstjänster innebär att du är en del av ett kunnigt team som sätter standarden för informationskvalitet. Du blir delaktig i ett spännande och omfattande utvecklingsskede inom hälso- och sjukvård. Vi som arbetar här drivs av en vilja att skapa ordning och reda samt att utveckla en stabil informationsinfrastruktur för att förbättra hälso- och sjukvården i Region Stockholm.
   

  





 Hos oss får du stort inflytande över hur kritisk information hanteras och struktureras. Du får även möjlighet att växa i gränslandet mellan verksamhet, informatik och IT. 
   

  





 Vi har kollektivavtal och med det följer kollektivavtalade försäkringar, tjänstepension och möjlighet till löneväxling. För att du ska kunna ta ansvar för din hälsa erbjuder vi friskvårdstimme och friskvårdsbidrag samt subventionerad sjukvård i form av kostnadsfri öppensjukvård. Flexibel arbetstid och möjlighet till att arbeta hemifrån har vi för att underlätta för dig att få ihop vardagen. Här kan du läsa mer om förmånerna i vårt kollektivavtal.
   

  





 Vi sitter i trevliga lokaler på Lindhagensgatan 98. Hit tar du dig enkelt med tunnelbanans gröna eller blå linje samt med flera busslinjer.
   

  





****Ansökan****




 Låter det här som något för dig ser vi gärna att du söker så snart som möjligt. För en komplett ansökan räcker det att bifoga ditt CV. När du ansöker kommer du att få besvara ett antal frågor, dessa ersätter personligt brev.
   

  





 Har du frågor är du välkommen att kontakta enhetschef Annabeth Bergqvist, annabeth.bergqvist@regionstockholm.se.
   

  





 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  





****Övrigt****




 Tester kan komma att ingå i rekryteringsprocessen som steg 2. Vi använder oss av Assessios tester MAP och Matrigma. MAP är ett personlighetstest och Matrigma är ett problemlösningstest som båda bygger på arbetspsykologisk forskning. Testerna används som ett komplement till dina erfarenheter och kompetenser.
   

  





 Hälso- och sjukvårdsförvaltningen stödjer Region Stockholms politiska organisation för att invånarna i Stockholms län har tillgång till en god och säker hälso- och sjukvård samt tandvård. Det innebär att förvaltningen beställer och följer upp hälso- och sjukvård och tandvård för 75 miljarder kronor årligen. Förvaltningen ansvarar också för kunskapsstyrningsorganisationen i Region Stockholm, samt en rad funktioner som är avgörande för hälso- och sjukvårdssystemet, såsom smittskydd, vårdhygien. Läs mer här
   

  

  

  





****Att söka jobb i Region Stockholm****




 Vi eftersträvar jämställdhet och jämlikhet på vår arbetsplats och ser gärna sökande med olika bakgrund och förutsättningar.
   

  





 Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via detta system. Ansök genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök”. Ansökningar per brev eller e-post beaktas inte. Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.
   

  





 Vårt rekryteringssystem kan inte hantera anonyma ansökningar eller sökande med skyddade personuppgifter. Om du har skyddade personuppgifter ber vi dig att kontakta den kontaktpersonen som finns angiven i annonsen. Din ansökan kommer då att hanteras utanför rekryteringssystemet. Du bör även vara försiktig med vilken information du lämnar i din ansökan och endast ta med information som är relevant för den aktuella befattningen.
   

  





 Region Stockholm ansvarar för hälso- och sjukvård, kollektivtrafik, regional utveckling och bidrar till kulturlivet. Varje dag, dygnet runt. I landets snabbaste växande region. Tillsammans skapar vi Europas attraktivaste storstadsregion.
   

  





 Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss i Region Stockholm

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
Are you a ready to use your skills for something that truly matters? Maybe you’ve built countless apps, optimized endless user flows, or maintained systems that never quite made a difference in people’s lives. Now, imagine putting your skills to work for something bigger - something that actually changes how healthcare, social services, and elderly care work together in Sweden.
   

  

 We’re building a next-generation platform that will transform collaboration across these vital sectors. We are now looking for experienced Fullstack Developers, who are ready to use their craft to make a real impact.
   

  

**Why Join Us?**
* Meaningful mission: Directly influence the future of Swedish healthcare and social services.
* Technical Leadership: Take ownership of architecture, drive technical decisions, and mentor colleagues.
* Modern tech & AI: Work with React, TypeScript, Java, Spring Boot, Docker, Kubernetes and AI-driven development.
* Growth & collaboration: Learn from talented colleagues and have access to mentorship and growth opportunities.
* Flexible culture: Enjoy flexible working conditions and a friendly culture built on trust and care.


**The position**
 You’ll be part of an agile and innovative team, contributing throughout the entire development lifecycle — from requirements to production-ready services. Depending on your experience, you’ll either grow into the role or take a lead in driving development and mentoring others.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Develop and maintain a modern, API-first platform using test-driven and AI-assisted methods.
* Mentor and support other developers, fostering a culture of technical excellence.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams (designers, product owners, domain experts) to deliver secure, scalable, and user-friendly solutions.
* Contribute to architectural decisions for scalability, performance, and security
* Stay at the forefront of technology and share your expertise with the team.


**About You**
 You are curious, eager to learn, and enjoy working with others. You thrive in an environment where you can grow your skills step by step, contribute with your ideas, and collaborate to solve problems together.
   

  

 At Cambio, we value initiative and personal growth. Our culture is built on Trust, Care, and Together values we believe are important to both our work and our people. It’s important to us that you recognize and identify with these values.
   

  

**Requirements**
* A passionate engineer with 5+ years of experience building great products using cutting-edge technologies
* Curiosity about AI and enthusiasm for exploring new technologies.
* Communicates fluently in Swedish and English


**It's a bonus**
* Experience working in our tech stack


**Additional Information**
**Place of employment** 
 : Linköping, Motala or Stockholm
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full-time, hybrid work model (three days per week in-office)
   

  

**Form of employment** 
 : Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

 We review applications and conduct interviews on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: Consumer Excellence Specialist
description:
Karo Healthcare, a dynamic and growing personal-care retail company, is all about making smart choices for everyday healthcare. With a wide-ranging portfolio across seven categories including medical products, we own and sell over 80 brands in about 90 countries. Our portfolio includes such brands as E45, Pevaryl, Lamisil, Nutravita, Decubal and many others. Our core belief in empowering people to make intelligent health decisions drives our growth strategy, blending organic expansion and M&A.
   

 Join us at Karo Healthcare on our exciting journey. We're currently looking for a Consumer Excellence Specialist for our office in Stockholm.
   




**What's in it for you?**
* A hands-on, consumer-facing role where your impact is visible every day
* Exposure to multiple established brands in a fast-moving, international environment
* Close collaboration with Quality, PV, Marketing, and Regulatory teams
* Strong opportunities to grow your expertise within consumer health and FMCG


**What you'll be doing**

**Consumer Enquiries & Support** 



* Respond to consumer enquiries across email, social media, and third-party platforms with accuracy, empathy, and professionalism
* Act as a trusted point of contact for product and brand-related questions
* Ensure a consistent, high-quality tone of voice across all consumer touchpoints



**Complaint Handling & Safety Reporting** 



* Log consumer complaints and feedback accurately in Veeva, in line with internal processes and regulatory requirements
* Identify and escalate adverse events and potential safety concerns to Pharmacovigilance and Quality teams in a timely manner
* Take ownership of complex cases, ensuring clear communication and end-to-end resolution



**Collaboration & Continuous Improvement** 



* Work closely with cross-functional teams including Quality, PV, Marketing, and Regulatory Affairs to resolve consumer issues
* Support and collaborate with outsourced consumer service partners to ensure consistent service quality
* Share consumer insights and feedback to support product, process, and experience improvements



**Brand & Portfolio Management** 



* Represent a portfolio of Established and Digestive Health brands, adapting communication style to each brand's tone and audience
* Maintain up-to-date product knowledge, including ingredients and regulatory guidelines, to confidently support consumers


**Requirements**
* Experience in consumer support, customer care, or complaint handling, ideally within FMCG, consumer health, skincare, or regulated environments
* Strong written and verbal communication skills with a clear, empathetic, and professional approach
* High attention to detail and strong organisational skills, especially when handling complaints and safety-related information
* Comfortable working across multiple channels such as email, social media, and third-party platforms
* Collaborative mindset with experience working in cross-functional and outsourced team setups
* Understanding of Pharmacovigilance requirements and the importance of compliance in consumer-facing activities


**Benefits**
* Opportunity to create, grow, and encourage
* Apart from a competitive salary pack, there are lots of growth opportunities to meet your personal ambitions
* Flexible schedule, hybrid model with the primary work place in the office, and life-work balance
* Responsibility for exciting and challenging projects that have a direct, visible impact on our customers and the industry
* Very positive work environment in a dynamic, international, and motivated team
* Start-up spirit while being a part of the large international organization with strong values



  
 



   
 



*Karo Healthcare has a Diverse & Inclusive environment. We are looking for qualified candidates irrespective of gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, race, religion, national origin, disability or age.*

title: Lead Architect - Software Factory
description:
*Passionate about making ideas a reality? Join our welcoming world of tech and let your ideas soar.*
 Saab is evolving fast, and software and AI are at the core. Join the team that supports Saab’s developers and play an important role in shaping our software engineering landscape.
   

  

 Your role
   

  

 We are looking for an experienced and forward-thinking leader to lead the architecture of Software Factory; Systems and Integration Engineering. You will be responsible for the overall architecture and lead and support our product areas and teams to enable effective development environments and modern software engineering practices across the organization.
   

  

 As a senior architect, you will be part of our extended management team. You will lead the sections architectural journey and together with the section manager support the organizations team leads and teams toward our vision. The section is part of the department Enablement
   

  

 Tech & Platforms within Group Digitalization, which drives digital innovation through shared, secure platforms and technologies that accelerate business impact.
   

  

 Key responsibilities
   

  

* Lead and support the engineering teams focused on software factory systems and integrations architecture and platform engineering
* Ownership and development of the target architecture for systems and integrations , mainly built on cloud platforms.
* Together with Chief Engineer and the lead architecture group take accountability for the overall architecture for to support Saabs transformational journey to an software defined approach.
* Encourage automation, standardization, and reliability across the software development lifecycle.
* Ensure platform solutions meet security, compliance, and architectural standards
* Support Inner Source practices and open-source collaboration within the organization


 This is a leadership role at the forefront of shaping Saab’s software development at scale. You’ll be part of a collaborative and innovative environment that values learning, inclusion, and tangible results, with opportunities for professional and personal growth.
   

  

 Your profile
   

  

 Required:
   

  

* Proven leadership experience in DevOps, software development, or developer tooling
* Strong technical/architectural background in cloud infrastructure and software development processes and golden paths.
* Experience defining internal development platforms and toolchains
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
* Fluency in Swedish and English
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent


 Preferred:
   

  

* Experience from large-scale software organisations or platform teams
* Experience with tools such as Git, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, and Python
* Familiarity with InnerSource, open-source governance, and developer education
* Understanding of DevSecOps and secure development workflows
* Experience working in hybrid cloud environments


 Location: Main placement is Linköping, Göteborg or Solna.
   

  

*This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.*
 What you will be part of
   

  

 Explore a wealth of possibilities. Take on challenges, create smart inventions, and grow beyond. This is a place for curious minds, brave pioneers, and everyone in between. Together, we achieve the extraordinary, each bringing our unique perspectives. Your part matters.
   

  

 Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 26,100 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.
   

  

 Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here.

title: Portfölj- och PMO-specialist - IT & Digitalisering
description:
*Vill du bidra till att stärka styrning, transparens och leveransförmåga i en av Sveriges mest samhällsviktiga organisationer? Nu söker vi portfölj- och PMO-specialist som vill arbeta nära verksamhet och IT i en komplex och pågående digitaliseringsresa!*




****Om oss****




 Hos oss på trafikförvaltningen får du jobba med starka varumärken som SL, Waxholmsbolaget, Färdtjänst i Region Stockholm och Spårvägsmuseet.
   

  





 Tillsammans ansvarar vi för halva Sveriges kollektivtrafik och vi har höga ambitioner. Vi utvecklar en av världens mest hållbara och attraktiva kollektivtrafik. Och vi jobbar dagligen med att minska vår miljöpåverkan, öka social hållbarhet och ansvarfullt förvalta våra gemensamma medel. Utan oss stannar Stockholm.
   

  





****Om rollen****




 Trafikförvaltningen befinner sig i en digitaliseringsresa med ett växande behov av digitala lösningar, vilket innebär kontinuerligt ökande antal initiativ, beroenden och parallella leveranser utifrån vitt skilda verksamhetsbehov. För att möta ökade krav på samordning, prioritering och uppföljning söker vi nu två portfölj- och PMO-specialister till gruppen Portföljstyrning och Leveransstöd på IT-avdelningen i sektionen Strategi & Styrning.  
   

  





 I rollen arbetar du operativt med portföljstyrning och leveransstöd inom IT och digitalisering. Du har en central roll i att skapa struktur, transparens och beslutsnära stöd till ledning, portföljledare samt projekt- och programverksamhet. Du bidrar även till att möjliggöra och driva uppföljning med fokus på nyttorealisering utifrån faktisk effekt och verksamhetsnytta. 
   

  





 Rollen innebär nära samverkan inom IT-organisationen samt med verksamhetsrepresentanter, leverantörer och andra stödfunktioner. Du blir en del av en nyetablerad grupp där arbetssätt och former fortfarande är under utveckling. Det innebär möjlighet att bidra till hur gruppen formas över tid både vad gäller arbetssätt och rollens utformning. 
   

  





**Några exempel på arbetsuppgifter:** 



* Operativt driva, samordna och följa upp IT- och digitaliseringsportföljer
* Stöd i prioriteringar, omplaneringar och resursbalansering
* Framtagande av kommunikativa rapporter, portföljöversikter och beslutsunderlag som enkelt visualiserar det viktigaste för lednings- och styrforum
* Möjliggöra och driva uppföljning med fokus på nyttorealisering, inklusive uppföljning av effekter, mål och verksamhetsnytta kopplat till IT- och digitaliseringsinitiativ
* Etablering och vidareutveckling av processer, arbetssätt och styrning inom portföljstyrning och PMO
* Stöd till projekt- och programverksamhet samt förändringsarbete kopplat till nya arbetssätt



**För att trivas och lyckas i rollen behöver du:**




 För att trivas och lyckas i rollen är du en strukturerad och analytisk person som trivs i komplexa sammanhang. Du har lätt för att samarbeta och bygga relationer med olika roller och funktioner, samt omsätter information till tydliga analyser och beslutsunderlag. Vidare driver du frågor framåt, är lösningsorienterad och bidrar aktivt till att förbättra arbetssätt och struktur. 
   

  





**Krav:** 



* Högskole- eller universitetsutbildning inom IT, teknik, ekonomi, management eller motsvarande arbetserfarenhet som vi bedömer likvärdig
* Flera års erfarenhet av operativt arbete inom PMO och/eller portföljstyrning inom IT och digitalisering
* Erfarenhet från komplexa, större organisationer med tvärfunktionella samarbeten
* Erfarenhet av att ta fram visuella rapporter, dashboards och beslutsunderlag



**Det är meriterande om du har:** 



* Erfarenhet av att driva uppföljning med fokus på nyttorealisering, inklusive uppföljning av effekter, mål och verksamhetsnytta kopplat till IT- och digitaliseringsinitiativ
* Kunskap om förändringsledning eller organisationsutveckling
* Erfarenhet av hybrid leveransmodell (agilt och traditionellt)



  
   

  





****Det här erbjuder vi dig****




 På trafikförvaltningen har du möjlighet att växa och utvecklas för ett helt yrkesliv. Här kan du vara expert och fokusera på ditt sakområde. Samtidigt som du jobbar i ett lag och i en organisation med stor bredd. Det finns stora möjligheter att röra sig mellan olika roller och uppgifter. Du har utrymme att forma din egen karriärväg och stärka både din personliga och professionella utveckling i en spännande och varierad miljö!
   

  





 Vi är en välkomnande och öppen arbetsplats där vi stöttar och hjälper varandra. Vi vet att nyckeln för att vi ska klara vårt uppdrag - är medarbetare som trivs, mår bra och kan utvecklas på jobbet. Därför lägger vi stor vikt vid att säkerställa hållbarhet i vårt arbetssätt, bland annat genom att erbjuda flexibilitet i vardagen och hybridarbete när möjlighet finns.
   

  





 Årligen erbjuds hälsoundersökning och friskvårdsbidrag på 5 000 kr. Hälsospåret, vår friskvårdssatsning, innehåller en rad olika hälsofrämjande aktiviteter. SL-kort är en annan uppskattad förmån hos oss. Läs mer om våra förmåner här.
   

  





****Välkommen med din ansökan!****




 Du ansöker med CV via vår hemsida, vi har inte möjlighet att ta emot ansökan via e-post. För att säkra objektiva bedömningar använder vi tester i samband med urval. Om du har några frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Thomas Rindstål, tfn 070 786 18 86. För frågor om rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta rekryterare Petra Magnusson, tfn 08-123 315 92.
   

  





 Ansök redan i dag eftersom intervjuer kan ske löpande. Sista ansökningsdag är
 **8 mars.** 
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan! 
   

  





 Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet. Grundutredning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan komma att genomföras innan beslut om anställning fattas. Vissa tjänster ställer krav på svenskt medborgarskap samt omfattas av en säkerhetsprövningsintervju med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585). 
   

  





 Provanställning kan komma att tillämpas och eventuella arbetsprov kan bli aktuella för tjänsten.
   

  





****Webb och sociala medier****




 För mer information om hur det är att jobba hos oss, besök vår karriärsida. Du hittar oss också på LinkedIn.
   

  





  

  





 Vi är stolta samhällsutvecklare. Med kompetens och engagemang tar vi Stockholm och kollektivtrafiken framåt. Vi ansvarar för SL, Waxholmsbolaget, Färdtjänsten och Spårvägsmuseet och tillsammans utvecklar vi en trygg, attraktiv och tillgänglig kollektivtrafik för nära 900 000 resenärer. Följ med oss på resan!
   

  





****Att söka jobb i Region Stockholm****




 Vi eftersträvar jämställdhet och jämlikhet på vår arbetsplats och ser gärna sökande med olika bakgrund och förutsättningar.
   

  





 Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via detta system. Ansök genom att klicka på knappen ”Ansök”. Ansökningar per brev eller e-post beaktas inte. Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.
   

  





 Vårt rekryteringssystem kan inte hantera anonyma ansökningar eller sökande med skyddade personuppgifter. Om du har skyddade personuppgifter ber vi dig att kontakta den kontaktpersonen som finns angiven i annonsen. Din ansökan kommer då att hanteras utanför rekryteringssystemet. Du bör även vara försiktig med vilken information du lämnar i din ansökan och endast ta med information som är relevant för den aktuella befattningen.
   

  





 Region Stockholm ansvarar för hälso- och sjukvård, kollektivtrafik, regional utveckling och bidrar till kulturlivet. Varje dag, dygnet runt. I landets snabbaste växande region. Tillsammans skapar vi Europas attraktivaste storstadsregion.

title: Produktionstekniker till Ljudhubben, Stockholm - vikariat
description:
Företagsbeskrivning gömd på alla jobb på hela kontot. Kontakta Jobylon för att visa igen.
   

  

 Sveriges Radios uppdrag är att sända radio i allmänhetens tjänst och vi har 7,4 miljoner lyssnare i veckan. Över hälften av befolkningen tar del av vårt utbud i någon form varje dag. Antingen i direktsänd linjär radio eller on-demand, i FM, på våra egna digitala plattformar eller hos andra aktörer. Vi erbjuder trovärdig kunskap, fördjupning, sällskap och förströelse. Att jobba på Sveriges Radio innebär därför att du, oavsett roll, är en värdefull del i ett viktigt uppdrag.
   

  

**Tjänsten och ansvarsområden**
 På Ljudhubben blir du som produktionstekniker en självklar del i redaktionens arbete med ljudet i fokus. Du blir möjliggörare för våra reportrar och programledare, att göra nyheter och program som är både snabba och vassa. Allt för att ge publiken riktigt bra lyssnarupplevelser.
   

  

 Ljudhubben hjälper samtliga redaktioner i Radiohuset och ger support, utbildar och handleder i våra ljudliga verktyg så att journalisterna känner sig trygga och vet hur de ska göra så att det låter så bra som möjligt.
   

  

**Rollen för dig som gillar samarbete**
 I rollen som produktionstekniker i Ljudhubben samarbetar man mycket med kollegor i sin närhet men även med andra delar inom Sveriges Radio. En god samarbetsförmåga är därför avgörande för att lyckas i rollen. Du behöver också vara van vid att ta ett stort eget ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och gilla att ta initiativ för att förverkliga produktionens mål.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har**
 Vi letar efter dig som är pedagogisk och strukturerad. Du har förmågan att på ett enkelt och begripligt sätt beskriva och handleda i tekniska verktyg och system, både för en grupp och enskilt. För dig låter återkoppling och coachning av redaktionen i ljudberättande, ljudkvalitet och hörbarhet som en kul utmaning. Genom nyfikenhet och öppenhet för förändring kommer du att jobba nära redaktionen och vara en viktig del av den dagliga radioproduktionen för att vara med och säkerställa bästa ljudet till vår publik.
   

  

 För Att Kunna Bidra i Rollen Som Produktionstekniker På Ljudhubben Är Viktigt Med En Pedagogisk Förmåga Samt Samarbetsförmåga, Du Behöver Vara Kommunikativ Och Serviceinriktad. Därutöver Behöver Du Ha
   

  

* Utbildning inom ljudteknik eller motsvarande erfarenhet
* God förståelse för dator- och IT-användning i en medie-/ljudproduktionsmiljö
* B-körkort för manuell växellåda är ett krav


**Det Är Meriterande Om Du Har**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta inom media och/eller inom pedagogisk verksamhet
* Kunskap om sociala-/digitala medier som publiceringsplattform


 Vi tycker att det är viktigt att Sveriges Radio speglar samhället och ser därför det som meriterande om du kan bidra med nya perspektiv utifrån bakgrund och nätverk.
   

  

**Anställning**
 Tjänsten är ett vikariat i 6 månader, 100% med placering i Radiohuset Stockholm. Tillträde enligt överenskommelse men gärna så snart som möjligt. Arbetstiden förläggs vardagar men även kvällar och helger ibland.
   

  

**Frågor och kontaktuppgifter**
 Vi ser gärna att du skickar in din ansökan omgående då vi arbetar med löpande urval.
   

  

 Frågor om tjänsten: Simon Rue Hallén, Gruppchef, simon.rue@sr.se, tel. 070-453 30 00.
   

  

 Frågor om ansökan: Maria Karnell, HR-partner, maria.karnell@sr.se.
   

  

 Sveriges Radio är en del av Sveriges kritiska infrastruktur och vi har en viktig roll i totalförsvaret. Därför omfattas vår verksamhet av säkerhetsskyddsregler. Den här tjänsten är placerad i säkerhetsklass i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) och säkerhetsprövning samt registerkontroll kommer att genomföras innan anställning.
   

  

 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: System Architect
description:
**System Architect – IoT**
 Permanent Employment – Stockholm/Sweden
   

  

 As a
 **System Architect in Sweden** 
 , you will serve as the strategic bridge between local vision and global execution, orchestrating a complex portfolio of digital initiatives for our Swedish client base. Naturally, you will be the glue between our Swedish customers, cross-functional delivery teams, and Cognizant’s regional leadership, ensuring seamless communication across all tiers In this role. Your ability to lead through influence rather than just authority is vital, respecting the flat organizational structures typical of our premier Swedish partners.
   

  

**About Cognizant**
 Cognizant (Nasdaq-100:CTSH) is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant is ranked 194 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com or follow us @Cognizant.
   

  

**About The Team / Business Unit**
 The
 **IoT Business Unit** 
 (Internet of Things) functions as a specialized "Engine Room" where hardware meets software. This team isn't just about connectivity; it's about translating physical sensor data into actionable business intelligence for Swedish consumer markets. The team under the IoT umbrella is typically multidisciplinary, organized to handle the full lifecycle of a connected solution—from the "edge" (the device) to the "cloud" (the insight). Human centricity is a key parameter making decisions and building solutions.
   

  

**About You**
 The
 **System Architect** 
 for the IoT Business Unit owns the
 **"how.** 
 " In the Swedish market, where industrial precision meets high sustainability standards, this role is the technical heartbeat of the engagement.
   

  

 As a System Architect, you are the master designer of the end-to-end IoT blueprint. You ensure that the data captured from a sensor on a factory floor in Malmö travels securely through the edge, scales in the cloud, and delivers a "single source of truth" on an executive dashboard.
   

  

 You are a visionary who understands the physics of hardware and the logic of software. You must design systems that are
 **resilient, secure, and future-proof,** 
 ensuring that the technology stack doesn't just work today, but can evolve over the next decade.
   

  

**Your Key Result Areas**
**Must-Have**
**Connectivity** 
 : Wi-Fi, LoRaWAN, BLE
   

  

**Data:** 
 Time-series databases (eg. InfluxDB)
   

  

**Security:** 
 PKI, TLS, OAuth 2.0
   

  

**Nice-to-Have**
**Connectivity** 
 : Satellite IoT / Starlink integration
   

  

**Data: AI/ML** 
 model deployment at the Edge
   

  

**Security:** 
 Hardware Security Modules (HSM)
   

  

 The System Architect will rely on you to provide the
 **Technical Roadmap** 
 . While they manage the client's expectations on delivery dates, you manage their expectations on technical feasibility. In Sweden, this partnership is often highly collaborative, requiring you to defend your architectural choices in a consensus-driven environment.
   

  

**Must Haves**
**Required & nice to have Skills:**
* End-to-End IoT Architecture: Proficiency in designing the 4-layer IoT stack: Perception (Sensors/Actuators), Network (Gateways/Protocols), Middleware (Cloud/Ingestion), and Application (Data/UI).
* Connectivity Protocols: Deep expertise in communication standards like MQTT, CoAP, etc.
* Cloud Proficiency (Azure/AWS/GCP): Mastery of IoT-specific cloud services (e.g.,AWS IoT Core)
* Edge Computing: Ability to design "intelligent edges"
* Security Architecture: Implementing IAM, hardware-root-of-trust, and end-to-end encryption to protect against physical and digital tampering.
* Data Modeling: Experience with Time-Series Databases (e.g., InfluxDB, TimescaleDB) and handling high-velocity telemetry data.
* DevOps & CI/CD for IoT: Understanding how to manage Over-the-Air (OTA) firmware updates and automated testing for hardware-in-the-loop.


**Nice to Have/ Your chance to grow**
* Swedish Market "Soft Skills": Knowledge of Swedish business culture, which prioritizes flat hierarchies, consensus-building (fika culture), and work-life balance.
* Regulatory Knowledge: Understanding EU-specific regulations like GDPR for data privacy and the EU Cyber Resilience Act for connected devices.
* Industry-Specific Domain Expertise: Deep knowledge in Swedish-dominant sectors like Home appliances, Smart Home etc.
* AI/ML at the Edge: Knowledge of deploying TinyML or computer vision models directly at edge

title: Business Analyst (Supply Analytics, Bangkok-based, Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 At Agoda, we bridge the world through travel. Our story began in 2005, when two lifelong friends and entrepreneurs, driven by their passion for travel, launched Agoda to make it easier for everyone to explore the world.
   

  

 Today, we are part of Booking Holdings [NASDAQ: BKNG], with a diverse team of over 7,000 people from 90 countries, working together in offices around the globe. Every day, we connect people to destinations and experiences, with our great deals across our millions of hotels and holiday properties, flights, and experiences worldwide.
   

  

 No two days are the same at Agoda. Data and technology are at the heart of our culture, fueling our curiosity and innovation. If you’re ready to begin your best journey and help build travel for the world, join us.
   

  

**THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (WITH RELOCATION PROVIDED)
   

  

 Location: Bangkok, Thailand (\*Not open for remote work)**
**Get to Know our Team:**
 As part of the Supply Analytics, you will be responsible for identifying new partners and opportunities, cultivating a relationship with them, and working together with them to deliver the best outcome for our end customers. You would also be responsible with managing the day-to-day interaction with the partner and working closely with other teams within Agoda to ensure the partners needs are met.
   

  

 We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value. Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s) or accounts. We develop win-win relationships and leverage Agoda’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek. Utilizing our strong brand and resources, we build new channels to increase the visibility of Agoda, introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business.
   

  

**The Opportunity:**
 As a Business Analyst, you will report directly to either the Senior Manager or Associate Director within the Supply Department and this will be an individual contributor role. You will be responsible and fully empowered to work with the partners on the ground. You will be supported by a team within the Supply department and work closely with other Team members within Agoda.
   

  

**In this Role, you’ll get to** 
 :
   

  

* Translate internal briefs into analytical projects (to include refining the initial brief and asking the ‘right questions’, working through potential hypotheses and storyboarding the output)
* Use and analyze data from multiple large-scale data warehouses and present statistically strong analysis to a wide range of business stakeholders.
* Proactively identify opportunities for growth within supply and the wider business.
* Drive new analytical initiatives and projects aimed at improving organizational efficiency and shaping Agoda supply.
* Identify, support, and lead projects aimed at scaling up the way the Supply organization leverages on data, insights, and intelligence.
* Automate manual operational processes and present back on time savings gained through modernization of business operations


**What you’ll Need to Succeed** 
 :
   

  

* At least 2-5+ years of experience working as an Analyst with experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy/BI
* Advanced working knowledge and hands-on experience in SQL
* Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in data visualization tools such as Tableau (preferably)
* Expert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, Python (or R)
* Bachelor’s degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
* A good understanding of statistical modelling knowledge or any machine learning technique knowledge (such as hypothesis testing, regression, logistic regression, random forest, etc.)
* Good stakeholder management experience. Comfortable presenting to senior leadership and C-suite.
* Experience in conducting A/B testing experimentation
* Strong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the business
* A hacker’s mindset – the ability to build simple but clever and elegant solutions to new problems within significant resource, operational and time constraints through deep understanding of the business, creative problem solving, and a wide range of expertise in data, analytics, automation, programming, and prototyping.
* Excellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skills.
* Data driven in both decision making and performance measurement.
* Extreme comfort in ambiguous, fast-paced environment.
* Ability to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resources.


**It’s Great if you Have:**
* MBA or Masters in a quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance).
* Program management certifications (e.g. PMI, PRINCE2) to compliment your program management experience.
* Asian market experience.
* Travel industry / e-commerce / tech / consulting experience.

**Discover More About Working At Agoda**
* Agoda Careers https://careersatagoda.com
* Facebook https://www.facebook.com/agodacareers/
* LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/agoda
* YouTube https://www.youtube.com/agodalife


**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy.
   

  

**Disclaimer**
 We do not accept any terms or conditions, nor do we recognize any agency’s representation of a candidate, from unsolicited third-party or agency submissions. If we receive unsolicited or speculative CVs, we reserve the right to contact and hire the candidate directly without any obligation to pay a recruitment fee.

title: Java Developer
description:
**This is Coody**
 We’re one of Sweden’s fastest-growing tech consultancies, expanding in both people and revenue. We attribute our growth to our simple yet powerful approach to Gravity-Free Consulting, combining the freedom and flexibility of freelancing with the security of traditional employment.
   

  

 At Coody, we believe in freedom, trust, and ambition, which means you’ll feel like a freelancer with free rein on assignments that excite you, while enjoying the benefits of being employed by a company that invests in your growth.
   

  

 Our senior sales team has built a vast, carefully curated client network, enabling our consultants to work with some of the most innovative companies in Sweden, Finland, the US, and the UK across Gaming, Fintech, Medtech, AI, SaaS, Aviation, and Automotive, tackling real technical challenges while shaping their own career paths.
   

  

 We’re a
 **diverse community of ambitious tech professionals** 
 , representing more than
 **14 nationalities** 
 .
   

  

**Coody is more of a platform than a traditional consultancy** 
 . Everything we do is designed to help you work and live according to your own priorities and ambitions. If you’re curious to see how this works in practice,
 **explore our Employee Handbook** 
 and discover a company that truly puts consultants first.
   

  

**Why Coody**
 At Coody, we cut out everything unnecessary to give more back to you as a consultant. And we have done it in the package of a lean and efficient organization, meaning no overpaid managers, no fancy offices and no extravagant conferences. Instead we give you:
   

  

**Maximized Compensation.** 
 Typically a +40% salary increase.
   

  

**Freedom & Flexibility** 
 . No bosses. All digital. Fully remote for those who prefer.
   

  

**Employment Security.** 
 High salary, pension, insurance, paid vacation and a big educational fund.
   

  

**Shape the Future.** 
 Projects and assignments for digital game changers like Spotify, Hemnet, Visa, Tobii, Toca Boca, Mojang, Flightradar24, SJ, and exciting startups and scaleups.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
 As a
 **Senior Java Developer** 
 at Coody, you’ll help build and scale new and existing products with real end-to-end ownership of the service, the code, and the outcomes. Assignments are typically 6–24 months, and as a consultant you’re expected to ramp up quickly and deliver value from day one. While your home base is backend Java, you’ll sometimes work across the full tech stack (e.g., frontend, integrations, cloud infrastructure, CI/CD, data flows) to ship complete solutions. You’ll design and build scalable, robust applications in cloud environments, contribute to architecture and testing/automation, and play an active role in a high-trust, high-performing team.
   

  

 Who you are
   

  

 We are seeking a
 **Java Software Engineer with at least 5+ years of experience** 
 . You must have a proven ability to get things done. Here’s what we’re seeking:
   

  

* 5+ years of experience building backends with Java
* A cloud native background using Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, AWS / GCP / Azure and Terraform - or such.
* Experience from additional languages such as TypeScript, JavaScript, Scala, Kotlin etc. is also appreciated.
* A degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Based in Sweden: You must have Swedish citizenship, a valid work visa, temporary or permanent residency.
* Fluent in English (spoken and written).


 How to apply
   

  

 Are you excited to take your career to the next level and meet the criterias? Apply now, and we'll be in touch shortly.

title: Field Sales Specialist B2B at Wolt
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 1000 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a
 **Sales Specialist at Wolt** 
 , you’ll be at the forefront of our growth and we want you to be our deal-closer towards restaurants, retailers, and other local businesses. You’ll identify potential partners, pitch the value of Wolt, and work closely with merchants to onboard them successfully onto our platform.
   

  

 With solid product knowledge, you will clearly communicate how Wolt can strengthen businesses and provide tailored solutions to meet customer needs. In addition, you will work closely with other internal departments to ensure a smooth transition from sales to implementation and support.
   

  

 We are looking for someone who truly wants to grow and develop within sales. At Wolt, ambition is the key to success – and we believe it’s your personality and potential that define how far you can go.
   

  

 This role is open to candidates with different levels of sales experience. Whether you’re building on a strong foundation and eager to take the next step, or you already have extensive experience driving complex sales and shaping sales strategies, Wolt will provide the platform for you to thrive. What matters most is your drive, curiosity, and willingness to succeed.
   

  

**What You'll Be Doing**
* Prospect and generate leads to identify potential new partners (restaurants, grocery stores, and retail shops)
* Pitch and negotiate with decision-makers, demonstrating how Wolt can add value to their business
* Close deals and manage contracts to ensure a smooth onboarding process
* Collaborate with internal teams (e.g., Account Management, Operations, Marketing) to guarantee partners’ success after launch


 Our humble expectations
   

  

* Previous B2B sales experience, preferably in restaurant sales or retail
* Excellent command of Swedish and English. Speaking another language is a big plus
* Willingness to travel extensively, as the role involves significant travel with overnight stays across Sweden (up to 75% of your working time)
* A driver’s license is not required, but considered a strong plus


 In addition to formal requirements, we will place great emphasis on your personal qualities and your interest in the role and Wolt as a company. Please be sure to clearly motivate in your application why you are applying.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

 At Wolt, you get the best of both worlds: the dynamic energy of a scale-up with a highly sought-after product, combined with the stability of a well-established company with strong owners and a long-term outlook.
   

  

* A unique opportunity to join a growth journey where your ideas about the direction of the company are welcome, and where you can contribute to developing new tools and ways of working
* A Competitive Salary Package and Benefits


 Next steps
   

  

 If you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership, and being part of an extremely ambitious team, then click below to apply and get the conversation going!
   

  

 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Junior Consultant
description:
*Are you interested in helping ambitious companies grow through organic marketing, and are you motivated by building and maintaining strong customer relationships?* 




*We are looking for a new Junior Consultant for our Client Management team in Stockholm, maybe you are the one we are looking for?* 




  





**About us** 




 Bonzer is a specialized SEO (Search Engine Optimization) agency helping businesses grow their online presence across Google and AI search platforms like ChatGPT and Copilot. We’re experts in tailoring organic growth strategies that combine strong SEO fundamentals with the latest developments in search and AI technology - always aligned with each client’s unique goals and ambitions.
 



  





**The role** 




 As our new Junior Consultant in Client Management, you will be responsible for building and maintaining strong relationships with our clients with the aim of contributing to their success. You will be a valuable part of the team, providing support, analysis, and delivery of our product, while also having the opportunity to work on various projects and develop essential practical skills.
 



 Together with dedicated colleagues, you will help our customers improve their marketing and customer acquisition strategies through organic marketing within both AI-search and traditional search on the Swedish market, as well as internationally.
 



 In the Junior role, we do not expect you to work independently from the start, but we do expect you to deliver strong results with the support of experienced colleagues and consultants.
 



  





**Qualifications** 




 We imagine that you are a recent graduate or at the beginning of your career - preferably with a background in marketing, communication, sales, business, entrepreneurship, or similar areas.
 



 Experience with SEO is not a requirement, but we do want to see that you have a willingness to learn, a curious approach, and a passion for the marketing industry. We will ensure that you receive the right support and training to succeed in the role.
 



  





 We emphasise that you thrive in a dynamic work environment where no two days are the same. As a consultant, you play a central role in building strong relationships, as a large part of the work involves close customer contact. That is why we are looking for an outgoing person with good communication skills who can navigate a varied and customer-driven workday. In addition, you are motivated by working with people and have a natural ability to build trust and long-lasting relationships. You are able to understand customer needs and translate them into value-creating solutions.
 



  





 We are proud of our employees and the culture we create together. That is why we are looking for new colleagues who thrive in a collaborative environment, value community, and share the same values as us, so that together we can strengthen each other and the company.
 



  





 We value your character and teamwork above all, and we’ll equip you with the SEO knowledge to build a strong career with us. In addition, you must be a resident of Sweden and fluent in Swedish, as the role is based at our Stockholm office. Fluency in English is also required, as it is our primary working language across markets.
 



  





**Benefits of the job** 



* Gain valuable insight and experience in the AI development and SEO
* In the role of junior consultant, you will have the opportunity to take on responsibility, which involves independent tasks that contribute to your professional and personal development.
* Work closely with experienced and specialized professionals in the industry.
* Rapid development opportunities.
* Opportunity for mentorship and skills development
* Become part of an international company in the Scandinavian markets (Denmark & Norway).
* Become a part of a strong team culture with regular events and activities that bring colleagues together.
* Be part of Bonzer - a growing team of 50 passionate specialists working together to create impact.



  





**Recruitment process** 




 If you are interested in the role of Junior Consultant in our Client Management department at Bonzer, please upload your CV and a short cover letter.
 



 We will get back to you directly if we see a potential match and invite you to a short introductory interview.
 



  





 The recruitment process consists of the following steps:
 


1. First interview
2. Second interview with case.
3. Last interview.



  





 We look forward to receiving your application!
 



  





 Best regards, Team Bonzer

title: Manager - Stockholm | BCG Platinion
description:
Who We Are
   

  

 Do you want to turn the challenges of digitalization into the solutions of the future? Join BCG Platinion in tackling the core IT issues of leading global companies. Deploy customized platforms, architectures, strategies, and organizations to leverage the digital potential of our customers and drive true innovation, with state-of-the-art tools such as cloud computing, AI, blockchain, microservices, and containerization. Add your individual strengths to our unique team, always there to support you. Together with Boston Consulting Group and our clients, we turn digital visions into reality.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

 As a Manager at BCG Platinion in the Nordics, you are responsible for the execution and management of our national and international client projects. We collaborate with colleagues from BCG Platinion and/or the Boston Consulting Group on site and directly with the client company. The Manager role incorporates structuring the project and performing the required resource planning. Besides the functional navigation of the project members, you will also be involved operationally in the project business. Together with our clients, you will develop convincing IT strategies, concepts and solutions, applying technical know-how and extensive experience in structuring IT projects, just as analytical and conceptual skills. We independently support our clients, present our results to their decision makers, and agree on the next steps.
   

  

 What You'll Bring
   

  

**You can help us make a difference if you**
* bring a completed a degree in computer science, (business) informatics, or a related area with above-average grades
* have at least eight years of substantial experience in IT consulting and the lead design and management of IT strategy and implementation projects
* already captured project-related management experience as the lead of teams with more than five people
* know how to plan IT initiatives and build solid business cases
* optimally steer decisions towards the goal and master escalating situations with an eye to solutions - even in complex organizational structures
* have successfully acquired consulting projects
* are excellent at understanding and communicating complex topics in English


 Who You'll Work With
   

  

**Shape the world of tomorrow**
* Independently contribute to build close client relationships - and as their trusted advisor, you are the first to whom they turn
* Acquire new projects and challenges for our company and yourself
* Be in charge of planning, leading, and assuring quality for strategic IT projects - we work with passion for our clients' long-term success
* Get to use your comprehensive knowledge of technology and industry understanding to provide both internal and external stakeholders with the orientation they need in critical project phases and challenging situations
* Think across projects and connecting factors, and plan resources to achieve the best efficiency possible
* Take ownership for presenting key project results at the highest level of client management
* Work with an entrepreneurial approach and passion to advance BCG Platinion with your contributions to people development, recruiting, and practice areas


 Additional info
   

  

**How To Grow With Us**
 We guarantee constant development incentives in an open and rewarding work environment! Together with a dedicated team of talented colleagues, you get to work on new challenges every day. Individual training offers and a culture of open feedback will provide the framework needed to explore and perfect personal strengths. Our modern structures allow focusing on the essence of our work - with easy travel booking, an excellent back-office support and comprehensive Knowledge Center. With our regular office Fridays and legendary events, we nurture a strong and close team network beyond our case work.
   

  

*BCG Platinion is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable.*
*#BCGPlatinion*
 Boston Consulting Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under national, provincial, or local law, where applicable, and those with criminal histories will be considered in a manner consistent with applicable state and local laws.
   

  

 BCG is an E - Verify Employer. Click here for more information on E-Verify.

title: Senior Security Analyst
description:
På Iver söker vi en skicklig senior säkerhetsanalytiker till vår SOC i Malmö/Stockholm. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i att leverera toppmoderna cybersäkerhetslösningar till våra kunder. Vi värdesätter innovation och laganda, och vi är särskilt intresserade av personer som tycker om att tänka nytt och dela sina idéer. Är du vår nya kollega?
   

  

**Vi stärker vårt nordiska samhälle**
 Iver är en ledande nordisk fullserviceleverantör av IT-tjänster, med spetskompetens inom drift, professionella IT-tjänster, cybersäkerhet, moln och innovation. Våra tjänster är avgörande inte bara för våra kunder utan även för digitaliseringen av samhället i stort. Iver, med huvudkontor i Stockholm, verkar huvudsakligen i Norden med en tydlig ambition att fortsätta expandera. Företaget har en omsättning på drygt 3 miljarder kronor och cirka 1 500 anställda fördelade på 25 kontor i regionen. Inom Ivers Managed Service Provider-erbjudande är Cybersecurity en dedikerad avdelning som fokuserar på att leverera specialiserade säkerhetstjänster.
   

  

**Din roll på Iver:**
 Som senior säkerhetsanalytiker kommer du att vara en viktig medlem i vårt cybersäkerhetsteam, ansvarig för avancerad proaktiv övervakning, incidenthantering och fungera som dedikerad kontaktpunkt för kunder. Vid kritiska säkerhetshändelser kommer du att vägleda kunder med tydliga rekommendationer och bidra till att säkerställa att deras miljöer förblir motståndskraftiga mot nya hot. Utöver ditt praktiska, kundnära arbete kommer du att bidra till att utveckla SOC till nästa nivå genom att dela med dig av din expertis och handleda kollegor. Denna roll ger möjlighet att direkt forma hur vi levererar säkerhetstjänster i världsklass.
   

  

**Typiska uppgifter:**
* Övervaka kundmiljöer, säkerhetsplattformar och larm för att upptäcka potentiella incidenter, eskalera och vägleda kunder genom respons och åtgärd.
* Leda utredningar av avancerade säkerhetsincidenter, utföra hotjakter och minska risker i nära samarbete med kunder och interna team.
* Samarbeta med säkerhetsanalytiker och säkerhetsingenjörer för att omvandla hotinformation till tillförlitliga detektioner, finjustera övervakningssystem och förbättra den övergripande detektionskvaliteten.
* Ge kunder tydlig, handlingsbar säkerhetsvägledning genom möten, rapporter och eskaleringar, bygga förtroende och säkerställa transparens.
* Stödja juniora analytiker, bidra till playbooks och procedurer och hjälp till att forma utvecklingen av våra cyber säkerhetstjänster.


**Vad som gör den här rollen unik:**
 Att ha en senior roll här innebär att få arbeta med några av våra svåraste och mest intressanta utmaningar, samtidigt som du har ett verkligt inflytande över hur vi löser dem. Om du ser ett bättre sätt att göra något, kommer du mycket troligt att ha friheten att prova det. Det här är en roll för någon som gärna fördjupar sig i detaljerna, praktiskt arbetar med teknologin och får saker att fungera bättre för teamet och våra kunder utan att behöva fastna i administrativa möten.
   

  

**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
 På Iver får du möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och vara en del av en spännande tillväxtresa. Vi är inkluderande och strävar efter genuint samarbete mot gemensamma mål. Iver erbjuder fantastiska möjligheter till utveckling, och vi finns här för att inspirera dig att uppnå dina professionella mål. Vi finns bakom dig när du vill lära dig mer inom ditt specialiseringsområde, ledarskap eller nya områden. På Iver är du också en del av ett ambitiöst och innovativt företag, vilket innebär att förbättra, testa, utvärdera och våga förändra vårt sätt att göra saker är viktiga ingredienser för att vi ska kunna utvecklas.
   

  

**Vilka söker vi?**
 Vi söker någon med flera års erfarenhet av liknande roller. Du är självgående, trygg i din förmåga, kommunikativ, organiserad, ödmjuk, samarbetsvillig och serviceinriktad.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du har omfattande erfarenhet inom flera av följande områden:
   

  

* EDR/XDR/SIEM-teknik - Eventuellt med fokus på att köra lokala alternativ i stor skala.
* Automatisering – Insikt i hur automatisering kan användas för att effektivt förbättra effektiviteten och förbättra kvaliteten inom ramen för MSSP-tjänsteleveranser, till exempel genom en SOAR.
* Incidentrespons – När det gäller att upprätta incidentresponsplaner och koordinera responsinsatser. Även om detta kan avvikas beroende på kandidatens övriga egenskaper, föredrar vi starkt om du kan delta i vår jourrotation.
* Kundengagemang – Att vara bekväm med att prata med olika nivåer av kundresurser och tillräckligt säker på att kunna hjälpa dem genom deras säkerhetsresa genom att ge rekommendationer och föreslå alternativa lösningar baserat på deras behov.
* Efterlevnad – Några relevanta ramverk är GDPR, NIS2, CIS18, PCI-DSS och NIST 800-61. Åtminstone på grundläggande nivå förstå vikten och konsekvenserna av svenska, nordiska, europeiska och amerikanska geopolitiska fenomen.


**Förmåner hos oss:**
 📄 Kollektivavtal & trygga villkor
   

  

 🏠 Hybridarbete
   

  

 💪 Friskvårdsbidrag
   

  

 👓 Terminalglasögon
   

  

 ⏳ Tidsbank – 24 h extra ledighet/år
   

  

 🩺 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension (ITP) & flexpension
   

  

**Plats:**
 Iver driver 25 kontor i Norden, med denna roll placerad i vår SOC i
 **Malmö/Stockholm.**
**Övrig information:**
 Vi har kunder inom alla branscher och sektorer, inklusive säkerhetsklassad verksamhet, vilket är anledningen till att vi utför bakgrundskontroller i alla våra rekryteringsprocesser. Ytterligare bakgrundskontroller kan krävas beroende på specifika kunder eller framtida uppdrag.
   

  

**Ansök till oss!**
 Urval sker löpande, tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag. Önskad start är så snart som möjligt eller enligt överenskommelse.
 **Sista ansökningsdag: 2026-02-28.** 
 Om du har några frågor är du välkommen att kontakta vår chef för MSS, Robin Carlsson, på robin.carlsson@iver.se.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att ta emot din ansökan!
   

  

**We empower our Nordic society** 
 . Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med spetskompetens inom drift, cybersäkerhet, cloud och innovation.
   

  

**Våra tjänster är kritiska inte bara för våra kunder – utan för digitaliseringen av samhället i stort.** 
 Vi säkerställer att sjukvården har tillgång till rätt patientdata, att samhällskritiska system aldrig ligger nere och att flygplanen landar säkert. Som en lyhörd och affärsnära helhetspartner möjliggör vi våra kunders innovation – idag och imorgon.

title: Metro Security Project Engineer (EMEA) Stockholm
description:
Metro Security Project Engineer
   

  

 RedCloud Consulting is a business and IT consulting company with local Puget Sound Enterprise and Mid-sized clients. RedCloud seeks a Metro Security Project Engineer to support immediate client operations. Seattle Business Magazine has recognized us, ranked #1 on their "Best Companies to Work for in Washington" for Mid-Sized Businesses list, awarded #1 Fastest Growing Company in Washington by Puget Sound Business Journal, and named on the Inc. 500/5000 list.
   

  

**Overview**
 The Local Security Project Engineer serves as the dedicated owner’s representative for the physical security scope across data center construction projects. This role drives onsite coordination, ensures adherence to security design standards, and acts as the primary liaison between internal stakeholders, General Contractors (GCs), and Security Integrators (SIs). Each engineer will support 3–4 data center projects within a 60minute drive in a given metro.
   

  

 This role reports via dotted line to the site data center services team, partners closely with onsite project teams, and aligns with the regional client team for technical guidance.
   

  

**Responsibilities Include But Are Not Limited To**
 PreConstruction & Strategic Planning
   

  

* Develop and plan the security construction program with early engagement to enable smooth execution.
* Review A/E drawings, design standards, and related documents; provide expert guidance to GCs and SIs.
* Lead security kickoff meetings with all project stakeholders.


 Onsite Execution & Coordination
   

  

* Serve as the primary onsite point of contact for all physical security matters.
* Guide GCs and SIs to execute work in alignment with approved security designs.
