We are looking for a Growth Account Manager to join our Scandinavia region, with the role open to candidates based in Sweden or Denmark.  

  

As a Growth Segment Account Manager, you will manage and expand relationships with customers across the Growth and Strategic segments, while engaging selected prospects and converting them into Eficode customers. You will own and drive all Eficode business within your assigned accounts, acting as a trusted partner who builds long-term relationships, expands collaboration, and contributes to sustainable customer and business growth.

**Role responsibilities**  

Reporting to the Head of Account Management Scandinavia, your duties and responsibilities will focus on the Scandinavian market, including:

* Nurture, grow, and expand relationships with customers in the Growth segment, driving long-term value and partnership
* Turn qualified leads into opportunities by engaging prospects from marketing, demand generation, and partner channels
* Identify and develop expansion opportunities across Eficode’s portfolio to deepen customer partnerships
* Create and execute account plans that strengthen stakeholder relationships and support customer goals
* Bring the right Eficode expertise to customers by collaborating with specialists across our business areas
* Use your understanding of the market and Eficode’s offerings to help customers solve challenges with holistic solutions
* Work closely with licensing, services, RevOps, and other business areas to ensure satisfaction, retention, and growth
* Partner with delivery consultants, and service managers ensure smooth execution and strong customer outcomes

 **Role Requirements**  

You will make a great match for this role if you have:

* 5+ years of B2B sales experience in a similar role, ideally within software, IT services, or consulting
* Comfortable working with CRM tools, including Salesforce
* Strong skills in value-based, customer-centric selling and building solution-oriented conversations
* Fluent in Swedish or Danish to support collaboration with local customers and colleagues, and confident in English as our corporate language
* Excellent communication skills, with the ability to understand customer needs and translate them into relevant IT solutions
* Confident using digital collaboration tools such as email, chat, and video conferencing to engage customers and stakeholders

 **Nice to have’s:**  

*It would be an added bonus if you have:*

* Post-secondary education in sales, IT sales, business, or a related field
* Interest in technical domains such as ITSM, AI, and DevOps, with a solid understanding of how these areas create customer value
* Experience selling consulting services, managed services, or subscription-based software solutions
* Familiarity with the Atlassian ecosystem or similar collaboration and development toolchains

 **Location & Setup**

* You’ll work in a hybrid setup, with remote working flexibility while also having access to our Scandinavian offices for collaboration and team connection.
* Occasional travel across Scandinavia to Eficode offices and customer sites is part of the role
* This is a full-time position with typical office hours and flexibility where needed
* The role reports to the Head of Account Management Scandinavia
* Possible locations: Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö, Copenhagen, or Aarhus
* Compensation includes a market-based salary with a commission plan (OTE model)

 **What’s in it for you?**


Eficode offer a range of perks and benefits for employees, including:* Generous paid holiday
* Health insurance & pension scheme
* Learning & development - We have knowledge sharing sessions, team activities, technical and soft skills trainings to all Eficodeans in our Academy.
* Regular social events, lunches and code camps
* A work laptop, phone and necessary work equipment

  

To find out more about life at Eficode, and hear what our people think about us, click here.**Application process**  

If this role sounds like a good fit, we encourage you to apply today. Selected candidates will be invited to an initial screening call with our Talent Acquisition team. The process then includes two interviews, followed by a final informal team coffee - giving you the chance to get to know your future colleagues and experience the team culture firsthand.

**DEI Statement**  

At Eficode we are committed to offering an inclusive recruitment process and equal opportunities for all applicants. We are dedicated to creating a work environment that embraces diversity, inclusion, and respect for all employees. We believe that our differences make us better. We recognise that by having diverse perspectives, skills, ages, genders, backgrounds, and cultures, we will better drive our customers forward and innovate in our field.

  

To ensure a fair recruitment process, please refrain from sharing unnecessary personal information or an image of yourself in your job application. **Salary Development**  

At Eficode, we believe your compensation should reflect the impact you make and how you grow along the way. Your salary develops through regular check-ins with your team lead, where we look at things like your skills, experience, client work, feedback, and overall contribution — both to your projects and to our culture. As a consultancy, it’s natural that factors like time spent on billable client work are part of the picture — but so are your development, collaboration, and everyday efforts that drive value. We also carry out a company-wide salary review once a year.
On top of your salary, we offer a broad mix of benefits, both financial and non-financial, to support your well-being, work-life balance, and professional growth.


Find out more about our benefits [here].

 **Beware of recruitment scams**
Eficode never asks for payment, bank details, or sensitive personal information during the recruitment process. We only communicate through official Eficode email accounts and approved recruitment platforms. If you receive an unsolicited message, job offer, or request for personal or financial information claiming to be from Eficode, it may be fraudulent.*#LI-LO1*

title: Full-stack engineers to Västerås!
description:
Sweden Digital & IT Västerås Hybrid
TMC is in an exciting growth phase following the acquisition of Level21, and we are now looking for experienced Fullstack Engineers (with a focus on backend) in Västerås/Mälardalen!

  


About The Member Company
We are a global high-tech consultancy company with a team of entrepreneurial engineers, scientists, and digital experts from around the world. Together we form a fast-growing and proud community. We offer consultancy services to high-profile clients globally in diverse service areas, such as:


* Technology & Engineering
* Energy & Renewables
* Life sciences & Pharma
* Digital & IT
**About this vacancy**
----------------------


Are you a backend-heavy full-stack developer with at least 5 years of experience looking for a new challenge? At TMC in Västerås, we are seeking passionate and dedicated developers with a strong enthusiasm for programming and solid expertise in the field.


In this role, you will play a central position in the development of digital solutions for our clients. You will be involved in the entire process, from building a backend that effectively interacts with the frontend to ensuring the application functions correctly. Your responsibilities will also include optimizing code that manages communication with databases, servers, and other software.


You will work in a dynamic environment with close collaboration between different teams, offering you an opportunity to develop both technical and communication skills.


**What we expect from you**
---------------------------


We are curious about you if you are a trained university or civil engineer with at least five years of experience in roles such as Fullstack Developer, Software Engineer, system architect, DevOps, or similar.


We assume that you are fluent in both English and Swedish.


To succeed in the role, you have:

* At least 5 years of experience with .NET/C#, Java, and/or C++
* Solid experience with React and/or Angular
* Experience with cloud solutions (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
* Experience with CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes
* Experience with microservices
* Strong experience working Agile


Experience with AI models is considered a merit.


**What you can expect from us**
-------------------------------


In the role of Employeneur, you get to develop both your technical expertise and drive your own growth and business. You become part of an innovative and entrepreneurial organization where the focus is on continuous development and the opportunity to take full responsibility for steering your own career. We place great emphasis on your personal commitment and your drive to advance your development. To succeed in this, you are given the chance to influence the types of projects you undertake as well as the professional development you wish to invest in. Simply put, you are in charge of your career. Since TMC is an international company, we can offer projects in various locations across different countries where we and our clients are present. Currently, we have representation in Sweden, the Netherlands, Belgium, France, Germany, Luxembourg, Spain, Portugal, Italy, Hungary, U.A.E., Mexico, USA, and Canada. The world is your workplace! #LI-LM4


The 5 basic principles of **employeneurship**
A long-term working relationship
Enjoy the security of a long-term contract and a stable source of income while getting the opportunity to work at diverse projects.


Individual profit sharing
Full transparency. That’s it. For each of your projects, you know your hourly rate, your costs, and your individual performance-based profit sharing, all in order to stimulate your inner entrepreneur.


Business cells
Our employeneurs are grouped in business cells based on their technical expertise. They are small, focused and function as high-grade knowledge networks. And as buzzing communities of close colleagues.


YOUniversity
Every employeneur drives their own career. Together, we make a plan for personal and professional growth. Receive personal coaching and an extensive training budget to keep developing yourself and deliver outperformance at our clients.

  

The Entrepreneurial Lab
Work on your technical dreams in our lab. Collaborate with others in multidisciplinary teams to unlock out-of-the-box thinking and innovative ideas as well as entrepreneurial skills.
company_description: At TMC we believe it's people who drive technology. Our Employeneurship model creates the best conditions for technical talents to do so.

title: Sektionschef Test & Verification
description:
*Vill du påverka och göra skillnad på riktigt? Här bidrar du till att skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen. Det du gör spelar roll**.*


Din roll


Som sektionschef hos oss har du alltid människan i fokus. Du leder, utvecklar och inspirerar din sektion samtidigt som du arbetar strategiskt med metodutveckling, produktstrategi och andra utvecklingsinitiativ – både på kort och lång sikt.


I rollen är du en aktiv medlem i avdelningens ledningsgrupp och bidrar tillsammans med andra chefer till att driva verksamheten framåt. Du är den strategiska drivkraften bakom vår test- och verifieringsorganisation och ansvarar för att bygga, utveckla och leda ett högpresterande team.


Rollen kombinerar tekniskt djup med tydligt och närvarande ledarskap, där du förväntas kunna påverka både operativt och strategiskt. En central del av uppdraget är att säkerställa att projektens behov av rätt kompetens och resurser möts, samtidigt som du arbetar aktivt med medarbetarnas utveckling, trivsel och arbetsmiljö.


Som sektionschef har du ett helhetsansvar för sektionens utveckling och spelar en viktig roll i att möjliggöra fortsatt tillväxt av vår verksamhet.


Ansvarsområden:

* Leda och utveckla sektionen med ansvar för personal, arbetsmiljö och kompetensutveckling
* Definiera, förankra och vidareutveckla en test- och verifieringsstrategi i linje med avdelningens mål
* Säkerställa en god arbetsmiljö och ett hållbart arbetssätt för medarbetarna
* Driva kontinuerliga förbättringar av testprocesser, verktyg och metodik
* Rekrytera, introducera och utveckla testingenjörer
* Säkerställa full spårbarhet från systemkrav till testfall och verifieringsresultat


Tjänsten är för närvarande placerad i Järfälla, med kommande flytt till nya lokaler i Solna.


Din profil


Vi söker dig som vill utveckla både människor och teknik och som trivs i en ledande roll där samarbete, struktur och utveckling står i centrum. Som nyckelspelare i ledningsgruppen känner du dig trygg i att fatta beslut, prioritera och kommunicera tydligt.


Du har tidigare haft personalansvar, exempelvis som chef eller team-/projektledare, och är van vid att leda och stötta medarbetare. Med ett coachande förhållningssätt skapar du engagemang och delaktighet i teamet.


En ideal kandidat är en erfaren systemtestare med god förståelse för kravspårning, regulatoriska standarder och test- och verifieringsarbete i komplexa system. Du har förmågan att omsätta övergripande systemkrav till en konkret och genomförbar test- och verifieringsstrategi.


Du arbetar strukturerat och analytiskt, samarbetar lätt över organisationsgränser och kommunicerar obehindrat på både svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift.


Meriterande:

* Erfarenhet av att leda test- och verifieringsteam eller en testorganisation
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av system- och GUI-testning av komplexa system
* Stark analytisk förmåga och beslutsamhet även under press
* Erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt och testautomatisering
* Kunskap om testhanteringsverktyg (t.ex. Jira) och CI-verktyg (t.ex. Jenkins, Azure DevOps)


Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.


Vad du blir en del av


Upptäck oändliga möjligheter. Anta utmaningar, skapa smarta innovationer och uppgradera dina förmågor. Det här är en plats för kluriga tänkare, modiga pionjärer och alla däremellan. Tillsammans uppnår vi det extraordinära, var och en tar med sitt unika perspektiv. Varje bidrag räknas.


Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 26,100 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.


Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här.


Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut.


Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Network Specialist
description:
Mediaflow is looking for a skilled Network Specialist to take ownership of our infrastructure. This role is ideal for someone who enjoys working with physical servers, building scalable networks, and supporting containerized environments. You’ll play a key part in strengthening the foundation that powers our platform and services.  

  

**ABOUT US**  

Mediaflow provides a digital media management platform used by organizations across the Nordics. Our tools help customers store, organize and publish media efficiently and securely. We value a pragmatic approach to development and maintain a collaborative, transparent culture. The team works primarily remotely, with in-person meetups at our office roughly once a month.  

  

**THE ROLE**  

As Network Specialist at Mediaflow, you’ll be responsible for developing and maintaining our core infrastructure. Your main focus will be on building secure, scalable network environments, managing virtual machines, and working with physical hardware.


You’ll also support our Kubernetes-based systems and contribute to improving overall reliability and performance. The role includes occasional visits to datacenters, such as our facility in Falkenberg, for hardware installations and maintenance. Some tasks may take place outside regular hours, but these are planned in advance and distributed across the team.

 **THE TEAM**  

You’ll be part of the Operations Team, a small and technically skilled group of three core members. The team works closely with one of the company’s founders, who remains actively involved in infrastructure work and technical decisions. While this is a new role, you’ll take full ownership of the networking domain and collaborate across the team to improve systems, solve problems, and ensure a stable, scalable environment

 **QUALIFICATIONS**  

**Must-have**

* Deep knowledge of networking, including routing, firewalls and scalable network architecture
* Experience working with physical servers and hardware
* Comfortable working in Kubernetes-based environments
* Familiarity with virtual machines and infrastructure operations
* Ability to take initiative and work independently within a team
* Willingness to occasionally travel to datacenters (e.g. Falkenberg)
* Flexibility to handle occasional work outside standard hours
 **Nice-to-have**  

We’d love to see experience with infrastructure that isn’t built on standard enterprise solutions, and an interest in low-level systems or hardware is a clear plus. A background in DevOps or broader infrastructure work is valuable, as is familiarity with virtualization tools and practices. You might have a degree in networking or have gained equivalent hands-on experience through other paths.

 **BENEFITS**  

This is a hybrid role with the option to work both from our office and remotely. You’ll be part of a technically skilled and collaborative team with a high degree of autonomy. We use modern tools and infrastructure, and you’ll have the opportunity to directly influence technical decisions and long-term architecture. The team meets in person roughly once a month, and all work-related travel is covered.

 **CONTACT**  

This recruitment is handled by our partner Detechtiv. For questions, please contact Anna at anna@detechtiv.se

title: Mid-Market Sales Manager EMEA | Remote Europe
description:
**The AI orchestration of your wildest imagination.**


n8n is the open workflow orchestration platform built for the new era of AI. We give technical teams the freedom of code with the speed of no-code, so they can automate faster, smarter, and without limits. Backed by a fiercely inventive community and 500+ builder-approved integrations, we’re changing the way people bring systems together and scale ideas for impact.


Since our founding in 2019, we’ve grown into a diverse team of over 160 - working across Europe and the US, connected by a shared builder spirit and with our centre of gravity in Berlin. Along the way, we’ve:

* Cultivated a community of more than 650,000 active developers and builders
* Earned 145k+ GitHub stars, making us one of the world’s Top 40 most popular projects
* Been ranked as one of Europe’s most promising privately held SaaS startups (4th in Sifted’s 2025 B2B SaaS Rising 100)
* Raised $240m to date, from Sequoia’s first German seed to our recent $180m Series C - bringing us to a $2.5bn valuation
* And are grateful for our 94 eNPS score (most companies would call 70 excellent)

  

That’s the company we’ve built. Now we’d love to see what *you* can build. If you’re applying, try n8n out - whether you’re technical or not - and share a screenshot of your first workflow with us. The easiest place to start is here: app.n8n.cloud/register.


We’re in a defining moment of an incredible journey. Come and build with us.


n8n is scaling fast, and our Mid-Market Sales team is moving from a run-rate of smaller deals to consistently landing high 5 into 6 figure, multi-stakeholder wins. As our Mid-Market Sales Manager (EMEA), you’ll lead and grow a team covering accounts from 100–2,500 employees, coaching them to identify and expand enterprise-level opportunities within their books of business. Reporting to our Head of Sales Europe, you will partner closely with go-to-market leadership, and play a pivotal role in our segmentation shift and ARR growth.

**What You’ll Be Doing**
------------------------


Lead, coach, and develop a team of Mid-Market Account Executives to consistently close high 5-figure deals and progress 6-figure opportunities


Drive deal strategy and execution across complex cycles, from discovery to close, including rigorous pipeline and forecast reviews


Elevate sales methodology adoption (MEDDIC/MEDDPICC), ensuring crisp qualification, clear next steps, and inspection of technical and business wins


Build a strategic selling culture that shifts mindset towards deals that are larger, multi-threaded, value-led engagements


Orchestrate multi-stakeholder relationships (economic buyers, champions, technical evaluators) and resolve conflicts to keep deals unblocked


Segment and prioritize territories within the 100–2,500 employee band to uncover expansion and upsell plays across existing accounts


Run high-quality deal reviews and QBRs that sharpen strategy, elevate coaching moments, and improve win rates and average selling price


Hire and scale the team, establishing operating rhythms and, over time, evolving the structure into high-performing sub-teams


Collaborate cross-functionally (Solution Engineering, Customer Success, Marketing, RevOps, Product) to align campaigns, refine messaging for technical buyers, and remove friction in the sales process  

  

**REQUIREMENTS**

### **Must-haves**

* Proven 6-figure closer and sales leader with 5+ years of management experience, leading teams to close complex, multi-threaded 6-figure deals
* Sales methodology excellence: Deep, practical command of MEDDIC/MEDDPICC and a track record of coaching teams to adopt it
* Strategic deal management: You’re fluent in qualification, mutual action plans, champion building, and executive alignment
* Executive presence: You motivate, challenge, and inspire—bringing clear direction, high standards, and strong communication
* Coaching & talent development: You upskill AEs through structured coaching, field observation, and actionable feedback
* Multi-stakeholder navigation: Skilled at aligning technical and economic buyers, de-escalating conflicts, and keeping momentum
* Change leadership: Growth mindset with the ability to reset norms, raise the bar, and drive a shift from small to strategic deals
* Manage up & across: Comfortable influencing senior stakeholders, presenting data-driven insights, and shaping strategy

**Nice-to-haves**

* Technical sales fluency: Experience selling to technical teams (e.g., DevOps, SecOps, IT Ops) and navigating technical evaluations
* Relevant market background: Leadership experience in Mid-Market or Enterprise SaaS across EMEA
* Entrepreneurial edge: You bring new ideas, challenge assumptions, and aim to outperform your own leadership benchmarks

*n8n is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.*

*We can sponsor visas to Germany; for any other country, you need to have existing right to work.*

***Our company language is English.***

*You care about diversity and inclusion? We do too! Check out our* *Diversity, Inclusion and Belonging initiatives at n8n* *(**https://www.notion.so/n8n/Diversity-inclusion-and-belonging-n8n-c1bec2fff536422d868b1a438d990e35**).*

***Location disclaimer:*** *If you see multiple job postings for the same role, it is most likely because we're hiring remotely for this role and posting in different locations to make sure every potential candidate can see the role. Please apply to the location you're the most likely to work from in the future.*

**Benefits**
------------

* **Competitive compensation** – We offer fair and attractive pay.
* **Ownership** – Our core value is to “empower others,” and we mean it—you’ll get a slice of n8n with equity.
* **Work/life balance** – We work hard but ensure you have time to recharge:


	+ **Europe:** 30 days of vacation, plus public holidays wherever you are.
	+ **US:** 15 vacation days, 8 sick days, plus public holidays wherever you are.
* **Health & wellness** –


	+ **Europe:** We provide benefits according to local country norms.\*
	+ **US**: Multiple low-premium, low-deductible medical plans with coverage for individuals and families—plus a no-cost premium HDHP option with a pre-seeded HSA—along with dental and vision coverage.
* **Future planning** –


	+ **Europe:** We provide pension contributions according to local country norms.\*
	+ **US:** 401(k) retirement plan with a 4% employer match.
* **Financial security** –


	+ **Europe:** We provide benefits according to local country norms.\*
	+ **US:** Company-paid short-term and long-term disability insurance, plus life insurance to support you and your loved ones.
* **Career growth** – We hire rising stars who grow with us! You’ll get €1K (or equivalent) per year to spend on courses, books, events, or coaching to level up your skills.
* **A passionate team** – We love our product, and we prove it with regular hackathons where we see who can build the coolest thing with it!
* **Remote-first** – Our team works remotely across Europe, with regular off-sites for team bonding. Some roles, like sales in the US, are hybrid—please check the job description.
* **Giving back** – We're big fans of open source, and you'll get $100 per month to support projects you care about.
* **AI enablement –** We believe in working smarter—everyone gets an unlimited AI budget to explore and use the best tools to boost productivity and creativity.
* **Transparency** – We all know what everyone’s working on, how the company is doing—the whole shebang.
* **An ambitious but kind culture** – People love working here—our eNPS for 2024 is 94!
* *Country-specific details are provided in your contract.*

title: AI Engineer
description:
Har du utvecklarbakgrund och redan jobbat med AI i praktiken? Hos oss får du bygga GenAI‑lösningar end‑to‑end - från idé till färdig produkt.



Är du driven och har erfarenhet av att arbeta med både tekniska team och affärsverksamhet inom data och analys? Vill du vara med och forma framtidens IT-leveranser på Folksam och få det att hända på riktigt? Då kan du vara den vi söker!



Sektionen Data & Analys ansvarar idag för utveckling och förvaltning av Folksams data- och analysplattformar, masterdata- och referensdatasystem samt utveckling och förvaltning av AI-lösningar. Nu söker vi en AI Engineer till Skanstull i Stockholm.


**Det här gör du som AI Engineer på Folksam**
---------------------------------------------



Som AI Engineer inom sektionen Data & Analys spelar du en viktig roll i Folksams AI-resa.



Vi arbetar i tvärfunktionella agila team. Ditt arbete fokuserar på utveckling och implementering av AI- eller maskininlärningslösningar. Du kommer att använda en rad olika verktyg och plattformar som exempelvis Azure AI Services, Azure Databricks, OpenShift, DevOps-pipelines för att hantera AI-lösningar från idé till produktionssättning.



Arbetet innebär även nära samarbete med kollegor från affärssidan för att undersöka och realisera olika initiativ inom AI/ML.



Nyfiken på att läsa mer vad man jobbar med inom AI på Folksam? Gå in och läs mer här!


**Är du den vi söker?**
-----------------------



Vi ser att du som söker har:


* En högskoleutbildning inom datavetenskap, maskininlärning, systemvetenskap, eller en liknande ingenjörsutbildning.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med utveckling av AI/ML-lösningar.
* Goda programmeringskunskaper, gärna i Python.
* Flytande språkkunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.


Följande är meriterande, men kan ersättas av nyfikenhet och viljan att lära dig:


* Erfarenhet av stora språkmodeller och vektordatabaser.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i Microsoft Azure eller annan molnbaserad plattform.
* Praktisk erfarenhet av Git, DevOps och CI/CD.
* Bekant med Openshift, Databricks och MLFlow.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med REST-API:er.


För att lyckas i det här jobbet ser vi att du är självgående och med tidigare erfarenhet av och ett genuint intresse för generativ AI. Du gillar att lära dig nya saker, gillar att arbeta tillsammans med andra i team och trivs i en miljö där du arbetar nära verksamheten. Vi är ett engagerat team som brinner för att utveckla lösningar som skapar värde för våra användare. Som team värdesätter vi parprogrammering, att hjälpa varandra och att utforska ny teknik.



Du är naturligtvis nyfiken på ny teknik, älskar att lösa problem, är innovativ och tänker utanför givna ramar. Du är en lagspelare som gillar att samarbeta med andra och är alltid redo att testa nya saker.


**Här kan du göra skillnad**
----------------------------



Välkommen till Folksam – här driver du viktiga frågor framåt. Från de avgörande detaljerna till de stora perspektiven, med fokus på att förenkla våra kunders vardag. Det gör att du bidrar till något större, oavsett roll. Här finns det många roliga, utvecklande jobb och du har goda chanser till en spännande karriär.  

  

Vi tror på ett hållbart arbetsliv och jobbar aktivt med inkludering och mångfald. Våra moderna kontor bjuder in till samarbete och lärande, här får vi saker att hända! Du har flexibiliteten att kunna varva arbete på kontoret med att jobba hemifrån, utifrån verksamhetens behov.



Läs mer och se filmer om livet hos oss på folksam.se/jobb-och-karriar.


**Så söker du jobbet**
----------------------



Välkommen att skicka in din ansökan senast den 11 mars 2026. För att söka tjänsten ber vi dig bifoga ditt CV och besvara ett antal frågor.



Om du har frågor om jobbet är du välkommen att kontakta avdelningschef Anna Fahlén, 070-989 15 13.



Fackliga representanter: Forena Morgan Svensson 073-423 59 12, Akademikerföreningen Per Hansson 070-831 60 67 och Handels Mikael A Carlsson 070-831 51 32.


*Kundägda Folksamgruppen erbjuder sedan 1908 försäkringar och sparande som ger trygghet i livets alla skeden. Vi gör det enklare för våra fyra miljoner kunder att känna sig trygga i en hållbar värld genom rätt försäkringar, rätt sparande och rätt hjälp när något händer.*

title: SENIOR SAP S/4 HANA EXECUTIVE
description:
Sigma Technology* All open positions
* Open Positions details
**JOB DESCRIPTION**
-------------------

**Lead SAP S/4HANA Transformation Programs**
  

  

Role Overview


As Senior SAP executive at Sigma Technology ERP Advisory you will hold a senior, strategic role within a large-scale SAP S/4HANA transformation. You are accountable for the overall leadership, governance, and coordination of the program’s foundational capabilities, ensuring successful delivery across technology, integration, testing, development, infrastructure, and security.


This role is fully dedicated to program execution and does not include ongoing operational or line responsibilities. You will act as the single point of accountability for SAP foundation domains and report to the Operations Program Manager.


Key Responsibilities

* Provide end-to-end leadership and accountability for all SAP foundation domains within the transformation program
* Lead, coordinate, and mentor domain sub-leads across Technology, Integration, Testing, Development, and Security
* Establish and enforce governance frameworks, standards, and KPIs across all foundation areas
* Ensure strong alignment between foundational capabilities, program objectives, and delivery milestones
* Act as the primary escalation point for risks, dependencies, and issues impacting program delivery
* Collaborate closely with program management, business leaders, IT stakeholders, and external partners to enable cohesive execution


Domain-Specific Accountabilities

**Technology Architecture**

* Define and maintain the SAP S/4HANA technology roadmap in alignment with the overall transformation strategy
* Oversee platform transitions and evaluate emerging SAP technologies, including cloud-based solutions and SAP BTP

**Testing**

* Provide strategic oversight of the SAP testing approach, covering automation, regression, and performance testing
* Drive continuous test automation and efficiency improvements across Template Evolution and Roll-in initiatives

**Integration Management**

* Own the SAP integration architecture and strategy, ensuring secure and seamless data flow between SAP and non-SAP systems
* Coordinate and monitor integration delivery in close collaboration with system integrators

**Development Oversight**

* Define development standards and oversee all custom development activities, including WRICEFs delivered via factory models
* Ensure code quality, reusability, and strict adherence to program requirements

**Security & Compliance**

* Define and implement the SAP security and authorization strategy in collaboration with internal IT Security and system integrator experts
* Ensure compliance with internal policies and external regulatory requirements


Qualifications

* Extensive experience in SAP architecture and foundation domains within large-scale S/4HANA transformation programs
* Proven leadership of cross-functional, international SAP teams and domain leads
* Deep knowledge of SAP S/4HANA, RICE/WRICEF, SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP), and cloud deployments
* Strong stakeholder management, communication, and executive-level presentation skills
* Solid experience in program governance and strategic planning


Preferred Skills

* Relevant SAP certifications
* Experience working with agile delivery models and DevOps practices
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, automated testing, and monitoring tools
* Strategic mindset combined with hands-on problem-solving capabilities
**CONTACT**
-----------


For more information please contact

title: Lead Architect - Software Factory
description:
*Passionate about making ideas a reality? Join our welcoming world of tech and let your ideas soar.*

Saab is evolving fast, and software and AI are at the core. Join the team that supports Saab’s developers and play an important role in shaping our software engineering landscape.


Your role


We are looking for an experienced and forward-thinking leader to lead the architecture of Software Factory; Systems and Integration Engineering. You will be responsible for the overall architecture and lead and support our product areas and teams to enable effective development environments and modern software engineering practices across the organization.


As a senior architect, you will be part of our extended management team. You will lead the sections architectural journey and together with the section manager support the organizations team leads and teams toward our vision. The section is part of the department Enablement


Tech & Platforms within Group Digitalization, which drives digital innovation through shared, secure platforms and technologies that accelerate business impact.


Key responsibilities

* Lead and support the engineering teams focused on software factory systems and integrations architecture and platform engineering
* Ownership and development of the target architecture for systems and integrations , mainly built on cloud platforms.
* Together with Chief Engineer and the lead architecture group take accountability for the overall architecture for to support Saabs transformational journey to an software defined approach.
* Encourage automation, standardization, and reliability across the software development lifecycle.
* Ensure platform solutions meet security, compliance, and architectural standards
* Support Inner Source practices and open-source collaboration within the organization


This is a leadership role at the forefront of shaping Saab’s software development at scale. You’ll be part of a collaborative and innovative environment that values learning, inclusion, and tangible results, with opportunities for professional and personal growth.


Your profile


Required:

* Proven leadership experience in DevOps, software development, or developer tooling
* Strong technical/architectural background in cloud infrastructure and software development processes and golden paths.
* Experience defining internal development platforms and toolchains
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
* Fluency in Swedish and English
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent


Preferred:

* Experience from large-scale software organisations or platform teams
* Experience with tools such as Git, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, and Python
* Familiarity with InnerSource, open-source governance, and developer education
* Understanding of DevSecOps and secure development workflows
* Experience working in hybrid cloud environments


Location: Main placement is Linköping, Göteborg or Solna.

*This position requires that you pass a security vetting based on the current regulations around/of security protection. For positions requiring security clearance additional obligations on citizenship may apply.*


What you will be part of


Explore a wealth of possibilities. Take on challenges, create smart inventions, and grow beyond. This is a place for curious minds, brave pioneers, and everyone in between. Together, we achieve the extraordinary, each bringing our unique perspectives. Your part matters.


Saab is a leading defence and security company with an enduring mission, to help nations keep their people and society safe. Empowered by its 26,100 talented people, Saab constantly pushes the boundaries of technology to create a safer and more sustainable world.


Saab designs, manufactures and maintains advanced systems in aeronautics, weapons, command and control, sensors and underwater systems. Saab is headquartered in Sweden. It has major operations all over the world and is part of the domestic defence capability of several nations. Read more about us here.
company_description: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defense to civil security.

title: Sr. Manager Software Development - AI Performance
description:
Overview:
**WHAT YOU DO AT AMD CHANGES EVERYTHING**
At AMD, our mission is to build great products that accelerate next-generation computing experiences—from AI and data centers, to PCs, gaming and embedded systems. Grounded in a culture of innovation and collaboration, we believe real progress comes from bold ideas, human ingenuity and a shared passion to create something extraordinary. When you join AMD, you’ll discover the real differentiator is our culture. We push the limits of innovation to solve the world’s most important challenges—striving for execution excellence, while being direct, humble, collaborative, and inclusive of diverse perspectives. Join us as we shape the future of AI and beyond. **Together, we advance your career.**
Responsibilities:
**SENIOR MANAGER: SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT - AI PERFORMANCE** **THE ROLE:**
AMD is looking for a Senior Manager to lead a high-performing team of performance engineers focused on optimizing frontier AI workloads on AMD GPUs. You will shape the technical vision, set direction for performance optimization strategies, and ensure alignment with customer needs and business goals. **THE PERSON:**
The ideal candidate combines deep technical expertise with strong leadership skills. You understand the full AI system — from model architecture and inference paradigms to GPU performance and rack-level design — and can translate that understanding into team direction, customer engagement, and upstream influence. If you are passionate about getting the best out of the hardware and shaping the future of AI performance together with your team, this role is for you. **KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:*** Lead and grow a team of performance engineers, ensuring professional development, productivity, and engagement
* Drive the development and delivery of performance optimization solutions aligned with customer and business goals
* Engage directly with customers to understand their performance needs and translate them into actionable engineering plans
* Set technical direction by identifying performance bottlenecks and defining strategies to overcome them, informed by end-to-end understanding of AI workloads and system design
* Contribute to and lead efforts in major open-source AI frameworks (e.g., vLLM, SGLang) to improve customer experience and influence the ecosystem
* Communicate effectively with upper management on team progress, technical challenges, and customer requirements
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define priorities and ensure timely execution
* Establish and uphold best practices in software development, profiling, benchmarking, and project management
* Foster a culture of continuous improvement, innovation, and technical excellence

 **PREFERRED EXPERIENCE:*** Deep understanding of GPU architectures, memory hierarchy, instruction scheduling, and performance tradeoffs
* Understanding of end-to-end AI systems: model architectures, inference paradigms (e.g., prefill-decode disaggregation, speculative decoding), and system/rack-level design considerations
* Strong background in performance engineering, including profiling, benchmarking, and low-level optimization
* Experience with AI/ML workloads and understanding of model behavior and compute/memory requirements
* Proven ability to lead and scale engineering teams in a fast-paced, customer-facing environment
* Strong proficiency in PyTorch
* Familiarity with major open-source AI frameworks such as vLLM and SGLang
* Hands-on experience with C++ and GPU programming using HIP, CUDA, or OpenCL
* Strong Linux systems knowledge and experience working in Linux-based development environments
* Solid understanding of modern software engineering practices (CI/CD, cloud infrastructure, DevOps)
* Excellent communication, organizational, and leadership skills
* Strong written and spoken English; working language is English
* Experience working with agile methodologies and cross-functional teams

 **ACADEMIC CREDENTIALS:*** Bachelor's, Master's, PhD or equivalent experience in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.

 **LOCATION*** Stockholm, Sweden or Helsinki, Finland

title: Bioinformatician with focus on systems development, NGI Uppsala, SNP&SEQ
description:
Are you interested in working close to cutting-edge research and supporting a broad scientific community? Do you thrive in a dynamic and forward-looking environment where you can both use and develop your technical skills? Then this position may be right for you.


The Department of Medical Sciences (IMV) is a large clinical department with approximately 250 employees and over 900 people affiliated through the Academic Hospital. The department has a broad research profile with strong research groups in various areas. The research takes place in close connection with the clinical activities at the Academic Hospital and includes both basic studies on disease causes and the development and evaluation of improved diagnostics and new treatment methods. More about the department's activities can be found at www.medsci.uu.se.


The SNP&SEQ Technology Platform at IMV is part of the SciLifeLab National Genomics Infrastructure (NGI) in Uppsala. We provide large-scale sequencing (NGS), SNP genotyping, and proteomics services to Swedish academia, industry, and international users. Our multidisciplinary team includes researchers, project coordinators, research engineers, bioinformaticians, system developers, and system administrators. Each year, we process more than 60,000 samples and generate over 400 Terabases of data. More about our activities and services can be found at: https://www.uu.se/forskning/snpseq and https://ngisweden.scilifelab.se/


We are proud to deliver high-quality data and are accredited by SWEDAC as a testing laboratory under the ISO/IEC 17025 quality standard.


We are now looking for a technology-driven bioinformatician to join our Data Operations group. The group at the interface of bioinformatics and IT, ensuring smooth and efficient data handling within the unit.

**Duties**


Your responsibilities will include:

* Designing, developing, and maintaining open-source systems for processing and analyzing large-scale genomics data.
* Managing data on our dedicated high-security compute cluster Miarka at UPPMAX, as well as on local servers.
* Automation of data handling and integrating systems for laboratory tracking (samples, steps, reagents), document management, and KPI visualization.
* Developing and supporting internal systems, including LIMS (Laboratory Information Management System) and existing DevOps solutions (e.g., Ansible, GitLab).
* Establishing, maintaining, and validating system documentation.
* Collaborate closely with Uppsala University IT, UPPMAX, and other SciLifeLab units (e.g. NBIS).


Other tasks may be added depending on needs and competence.


The systems and tools you will work with include Arteria (https://github.com/arteria-project), CheckQC (https://github.com/Molmed/checkQC), nf-core pipelines (https://nf-co.re/), and Nextflow.

**Requirements**

* University degree in bioinformatics, computer science, IT, or a related field.
* At least three years of documented work experience in bioinformatics-related systems development.
* Excellent knowledge of Python or a similar programming language.
* Experience in developing pipelines for data processing and management, such as Nextflow or similar systems.
* Knowledge of methods and applications in molecular biology and genetics.
* Experience using Git for version control.
* Ability to quickly learn new skills.
* Experience working in a Unix/Linux environment.
* Excellent verbal and written English skills.


We are seeking a candidate who is detail-oriented, quick to learn new skills, and able to work both independently and collaboratively.  

In addition to the qualification requirements listed above, we highly value prior experience in one or more of the following areas

**Särskilt meriterande krav**

* Experience in using computer clusters and distributed systems.
* Experience in virtualized environments, e.g., Docker or Apptainer.
* Experience with software deployment and infrastructure automation, e.g. Ansible, and CI pipelines.
* Experience with modern software engineering practices, such as code reviews, testing, automated testing, and CI/CD workflows.

**Additional qualifications**

* Doctoral degree including bioinformatics with a focus on genomics, genetics, or a related area
* Establishing and maintaining system documentation and test specifications.
* Understanding of information security principles.
* Working with Agile methodologies/Scrum.
* Experience in LIMS development.
* Experience in data management and FAIR data handling, including public repositories such as ENA or ArrayExpress.
* Experience working in quality-assured environments, e.g. in accordance with ISO 17025 or ISO 27001.
* Good verbal and written Swedish skills.

**Highly preferred qualifications**  

  

The employment is a permanent position (a six-month probationary period may be applied). Scope of employment 100 %. Starting date June 1, 2026 or as agreed. Placement: Uppsala

**For further information about the position, please contact:** Kristina Larsson, head of Data Operations, kristina.larsson@medsci.uu.se, Ulrika Liljedahl, head of unit SNP&SEQ, ulrika.liljedahl@medsci.uu.se.

**Application procedure**


In this recruitment, we have replaced the personal letter with questions that you answer in connection with your application. The answers will be used as part of the selection process. In addition, the following documentation is required:

* CV
* Documents that prove the requested competence

**Please submit your application by 13 March 2026. Reference number: UFV-PA 2026/506.**
Uppsala University is a broad research university with a strong international position. The ultimate goal is to conduct education and research of the highest quality and relevance to make a difference in society. Our most important asset is all of our 7,600 employees and 53,000 students who, with curiosity and commitment, make Uppsala University one of Sweden’s most exciting workplaces. Read more about our benefits and what it is like to work at Uppsala Universityhttps://uu.se/om-uu/jobba-hos-oss/ The position may be subject to security vetting. If security vetting is conducted, the applicant must pass the vetting process to be eligible for employment. Please do not send offers of recruitment or advertising services. Submit your application through Uppsala University's recruitment system.

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
***Cloud Architect & Engineers - AWS***




***Leading Nordic IT Consultancy Company - Sweden***




  





 Would you like the opportunity to join Sweden's fastest-growing IT organizations in the Nordics, renowned for delivering secure and cutting-edge Cloud solutions to high-profile enterprises and public entities.
 



  





 In the last 3 years they have grown their market leading business to over 500 colleagues, with significant growth and investment occurring in their cloud division. They work with the largest enterprises in the Nordics and cover the entire spectrum from public cloud to private cloud, including air-gapped solutions for defense and national security. Some of the assignments may therefore require security clearance.
 



  





**Requirements:** 




  




* 3+ years experience of Cloud Architecture in AWS.
* Nice to have - Cloud Adoption Framework (CAF) or Well-Architected Framework (WAF)
* Swedish speaking, Swedish citizenship.
* Infrastructure-as-Code (Terraform or CloudFormation)
* DevOps & CI/CD - GitHub Actions or similar tools



  





 You don't have to be an expert and know all of this, but you must be both curious and willing to learn.
 



  





**Some of what they offer:** 




  




* 6 weeks vacation and certification bonuses
* Good pension and insurance schemes
* Contribution to SATS membership and access to company cabins
* One of the Nordic's largest professional community within cloud technologies, where knowledge sharing is central



  





  





*Thank you for your interest in this opportunity. If your application is successful, we will contact you to discuss the position in more detail within 48 hours of receiving your CV. Please assume your application has been unsuccessful if you do not hear back from us within 48 hours.*

title: DevSecOps Engineer
description:
Position Description
   

  

 CGI's Development CoE söker fler duktiga DevOps-tekniker som vill växa tillsammans med oss. Hos oss är det lätt att trivas – vi stöttar varandra, delar kunskap och ser till att ha kul längs vägen. Hos oss är det lätt att vara sig själv, och det finns alltid någon att bolla idéer eller utmaningar med.
   

  

 Vår vardag består av spännande projekt där vi tillsammans hittar smarta lösningar för våra kunder. Du blir en del av ett team med bred kompetens och stort hjärta, där samarbete både internt och med våra kunder står i fokus.
   

  

 Och ja, vi gillar att göra saker tillsammans även utanför jobbet – som en spelkväll eller AW då och då – helt frivilligt så klart! Om du vill arbeta i ett globalt företag som är marknadsledande inom IT i Sverige, men samtidigt få känslan av en tight och trygg arbetsgrupp – då tror vi att du kommer trivas riktigt bra hos oss.
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
**Together, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.**
 Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…
   

  

 You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.
   

  

 Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.
   

  

 You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.
   

  

 Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.
   

  

 DevSecOps Engineer
   

  

**Job Description**
 CGI's Development CoE söker fler duktiga DevOps-tekniker som vill växa tillsammans med oss. Hos oss är det lätt att trivas – vi stöttar varandra, delar kunskap och ser till att ha kul längs vägen. Hos oss är det lätt att vara sig själv, och det finns alltid någon att bolla idéer eller utmaningar med.
   

  

 Vår vardag består av spännande projekt där vi tillsammans hittar smarta lösningar för våra kunder. Du blir en del av ett team med bred kompetens och stort hjärta, där samarbete både internt och med våra kunder står i fokus.
   

  

 Och ja, vi gillar att göra saker tillsammans även utanför jobbet – som en spelkväll eller AW då och då – helt frivilligt så klart! Om du vill arbeta i ett globalt företag som är marknadsledande inom IT i Sverige, men samtidigt få känslan av en tight och trygg arbetsgrupp – då tror vi att du kommer trivas riktigt bra hos oss.
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

* Designa, implementera och hantera Azure iPaaS-lösningar, inklusive infrastrukturprovisionering med ARM/Bicep.
* Utveckla och underhålla infrastrukturautomationsskript med Python eller PowerShell.
* Konfigurera och optimera CI/CD-pipelines med Azure DevOps för effektiv bygg- och releasehantering.
* Hantera versionshanteringssystem, upprätthålla Git-arbetsflöden och stödja strategier för grening och sammanslagning.
* Ansvara för hela infrastrukturen under dess livscykel – från miljöuppsättning till övervakning, underhåll och felsökning.
* Stödja byggprocesser, pakethantering och distribution av applikationer i både produktions- och testmiljöer.
* Integrera och underhålla verktyg för kodkvalitet och artefakthantering såsom SonarQube och Artifactory; stödja observabilitet via Elastic Stack eller Splunk.
* Integrera säkerhetskontroller och rutiner i CI/CD-arbetsflöden, med efterlevnad av organisatoriska och regulatoriska standarder.
* Integrera och underhålla verktyg för statisk och dynamisk kodanalys inom utvecklingslivscykeln.
* Implementera härdning av infrastruktur, efterlevnad av konfigurationspolicyer och automatiserat säkerhetsregelverk med exempelvis Azure Policy.
* Samarbeta med säkerhetsteam för att stödja incidentdetektion, analys och respons i molnbaserade plattformar.


**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av DevOps-, SecOps- eller molninfrastruktur.
* Stark analytisk förmåga och vana att tolka och implementera komplexa krav.
* Djup kompetens inom Azure iPaaS, Resource Manager och distribution via ARM/Bicep-mallar.
* Praktisk erfarenhet av att skriva skript i Python eller PowerShell.
* God kunskap om Azure DevOps pipelines, bygg-/releaseprocesser och applikationsdistribution i olika miljöer.
* Gedigen förståelse för Git, branching strategier och best practices inom versionshantering.
* Erfarenhet av att hantera hela infrastrukturen under dess livscykel, inklusive underhåll, övervakning och felsökning.
* Kännedom om byggverktyg, pakethantering och applikationsserverinfrastruktur.
* Arbetskunskap om databaser, nätverk och integrationsplattformar.
* Erfarenhet av SonarQube, Artifactory och gärna Elastic Stack eller Splunk.
* Förmåga att leda estimeringar, teknisk design, utveckling och distributioner.
* Erfarenhet av att implementera säkerhetsrutiner i CI/CD-pipelines.
* Kännedom om statisk och dynamisk kodanalys för säker kodvalidering.
* Förståelse för infrastrukturhärdning och automatisering av efterlevnad.
* Erfarenhet av att integrera säkerhetsskanningsverktyg (t.ex. sårbarhetsskanning av beroenden).


 Meriterande om du också har:
   

  

* Certifiering: Microsoft Certified – Azure Administrator Associate
* Erfarenhet av hotmodellering och riskbedömningar.
* Kännedom om SIEM-verktyg och plattformar för sårbarhetshantering.


 Vad du kan förvänta dig av oss:
   

  

 Integrationsteamet på CGI är ett gäng som trivs ihop, delar kunskap och stöttar varandra. Här är det lätt att vara sig själv, och det finns alltid någon att bolla idéer med. Ibland gör vi något kul tillsammans efter jobbet, som en spelkväll – bara om man vill, såklart!
   

  

**Låter det intressant?**
 Vi ser fram emot att höra ifrån dig! Skicka in din ansökan redan i dag då urvalet sker löpande. Har du frågor om rollen, kontakta gärna rekryterande konsultchef Ramya Parthasarathy, ramya.parthasarathy@cgi.com eller konsultchef Henrik Sjöstedt, henrik,sjostedt@cgi.com.
   

  

**Vad CGI erbjuder dig**
 CGIs kombination av global och lokal närvaro, med kontor på 30 orter i Sverige, ger nöjda kunder men innebär även att du som anställd alltid har ett kontor nära dig. Detta i kombination med flexibla arbetstider ger dig möjlighet till balans mellan privatliv och arbete, oavsett var i livet just du befinner dig.
   

  

 På CGI finns även stora möjligheter till interna karriärvägar där du kan välja att bli specialist inom ditt område, bredda dig inom nya områden eller ta en ledande befattning. Via våra interna nätverk, projekt och åtaganden i globala och nationella industrier, erbjuder vi dig kompetensutveckling och engagerade ledare som stöttar just dig i din utveckling.
   

  

 Mer information om våra förmåner:
   

  

* Aktieprogram och delägarskap: Som delägare har du möjlighet att påverka och i vårt aktieprogram matchar CGI ditt bidrag, krona för krona upp till 3% av din månadslön.
* Friskvårdsbidrag: Vi erbjuder ett årligt friskvårdsbidrag på 4000 kr.
* Föräldralön: Vi betalar upp till cirka 90% av din lön under den första tiden hemma.
* Trygg anställning: Våra konsulter anställs med kollektivavtal och försäkringar.
* Pensionslösningar: Vi erbjuder attraktiva och förmånliga pensionslösningar.
* Personalbil: Personalbilen används som en privatbil men leasas av CGI.


**Ensemble, en tant que propriétaires, mettons notre savoir-faire à l’œuvre.**
 La vie chez CGI est ancrée dans l’actionnariat, le travail d’équipe, le respect et un sentiment d’appartenance. Chez nous, vous pourrez exploiter votre plein potentiel parce que…
   

  

 Nous vous invitons à devenir propriétaire dès le jour 1 alors que nous travaillons ensemble à faire de notre rêve une réalité. C’est pourquoi nous nous désignons comme associés de CGI, plutôt que comme employés. Nous tirons profit des retombées de notre succès collectif et contribuons activement à l’orientation et à la stratégie de notre entreprise.
   

  

 Votre travail crée de la valeur. Vous élaborerez des solutions novatrices et développerez des relations durables avec vos collègues et clients, tout en ayant accès à des capacités mondiales pour concrétiser vos idées, saisir de nouvelles opportunités, et bénéficier d’une expertise sectorielle et technologique de pointe.
   

  

 Vous ferez évoluer votre carrière en vous joignant à une entreprise bâtie pour croître et durer. Vous serez soutenus par des leaders qui ont votre santé et bien-être à cœur et qui vous permettront de saisir des occasions afin de parfaire vos compétences et élargir les horizons.
   

  

 Joignez-vous à nous, l’une des plus importantes entreprises de conseil en technologie de l’information (TI) et en management au monde.

title: Cloud Operations Engineer till Vimla!
description:
**Om oss!**
 Vimla är den snabbfotade kusinen i Telenor-familjen som erbjuder mobiltelefoni med en twist!
   

  

 Vi tar kundfokus och schyssthet till en ny nivå på den svenska mobilmarknaden. Hos oss står kunden i centrum, genom enkelhet, transparens och en genuin vilja att skapa värde. Det ska vara enkelt och roligt att vara kund hos oss.
   

  

 Resultatet? Sveriges Nöjdaste Mobilkunder 2022, 2023, 2024 och 2025!
   

  

 Vi är Vimla – mobiloperatören med bra vibrationer!
   

  

**Vad du kommer att göra**
 Som
 **Cloud Operations Engineer** 
 i Vimlas tekniska driftsteam får du en central roll i att forma och säkra vår framtida driftmiljö med särskilt fokus på vår molnplattform i
 **AWS** 
 . Du blir en drivande kraft i våra moderniseringsinitiativ och leder förändringsprojekt från idéstadium till genomförande och uppföljning. I nära samarbete med kollegor över hela organisationen – utvecklingsteam, arkitekter, leverantörer och partners – arbetar du för att skapa en stabil, effektiv och skalbar infrastruktur.
   

  

 Vimla står mitt i en spännande moderniseringsresa där AWS är en nyckelkomponent, och ditt bidrag blir avgörande för att vi ska lyckas. I rollen ingår även ansvar för att underhålla och vidareutveckla våra interna tjänster, stötta kollegor i tekniska frågor och delta i beredskap för interna system och integrationer. Här får du stor möjlighet att påverka, bidra med idéer och utmana etablerade arbetssätt.
   

  

 I ditt arbete kommer du bland annat att:
   

  

* Driva och hantera projekt, både internt och tillsammans med partners eller leverantörer
* Samarbeta med kollegor i hela Vimla för att förstå behov och prioritera initiativ
* Arbeta nära våra arkitekter för att säkerställa god systemutveckling och robusta lösningar
* Identifiera, analysera och lösa problem i vår tekniska miljö


**Vem vi söker**
 Vi söker dig som har en utbildning inom datavetenskap eller motsvarande erfarenhet, och som har god kunskap och praktisk erfarenhet av att arbeta i
 **AWS‑miljöer** 
 . Du är trygg i
 **Linux** 
 , van att arbeta med
 **SQL** 
 (Oracle eller Postgres) och har erfarenhet av övervakningsverktyg som
 **Splunk** 
 .
   

  

 Har du dessutom arbetat med
 **telco‑stacks** 
 ,
 **Shell‑scripting** 
 eller
 **Python** 
 är det meriterande. Vi uppskattar om du har ett analytiskt förhållningssätt och tidigare har drivit förbättringsarbete baserat på datadrivna beslut – och gärna utmanar oss i hur vi kan utveckla våra arbetssätt.
   

  

 Som person är du en nyfiken och lösningsorienterad teamspelare som trivs i ett mindre team där samarbete och eget ansvar går hand i hand. Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och tycker om att bidra med nya idéer och perspektiv. Framför allt letar vi efter dig som är engagerad, ambitiös och vill vara med och utveckla våra tekniska lösningar framåt.
   

  

**Varför du vill jobba på Vimla**
 Vimla är på en spännande tillväxtresa och möjligheterna att växa och utvecklas tillsammans med oss är enorma. Vi är ett roligt, tight team på runt 40 personer i en egen organisation. Samtidigt är Vimla en del av Telenor Sverige och använder tryggheten som finns i ett stort bolag.
   

  

**Ansök idag!**
 Om du är intresserad och vill veta mer, kontakta Viktor Fridner, Head of Operations: viktor@vimla.se
   

  

 Ansök genom att följa länken "ansök" i annonsen. Vi gallrar ansökningar löpande så vänta inte med din ansökan. Vi utvärderar inte CV:n som skickas direkt till oss på e-post.
   

  

**Bra att veta**
 I enlighet med Telenors policy genomför vi en bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidater i alla rekryteringar.
   

  

 Plats: Stockholm Råsunda
   

  

 Språk: Svenska
   

  

 Flexibelt arbete: Ja, med 3 dagar/vecka på kontor

title: Devops Ingenjör
company: The National Board of Health and Welfare (Socialstyrelsen)
description:
Vill du vara med och utveckla containerplattformar för hälso- och sjukvårds-, tandvård- och socialtjänstdata på Digitaliseringsavdelningen på Socialstyrelsen. Din kompetens kommer att göra direkt samhällsnytta.
 



 Vi söker två DevOps-ingenjörer som vill arbeta i en tekniskt avancerad miljö för att utveckla, förbättra och automatisera vår operativa dataflödesplattform för hälso- och sjukvårdsdata. Som DevOps-ingenjör hos oss arbetar du nära utvecklingsteam, arkitekter och drift för att säkerställa stabila, skalbara och säkra lösningar.
 



  





**Du kommer att:** 



* Utveckla och förvalta vår dataflödesplattform baserad på containerteknik
* Sätta upp och automatisera CI/CD flöden och infrastruktur
* Säkerställa hög tillgänglighet, säkerhet och prestanda i våra miljöer
* Arbete med övervakning, logghantering och felsökning
* Bidra till förbättring av DevOps-processer och arbetssätt



  





**Vi söker dig som har** 



* Minst 7 års erfarenhet av arbete inom DevOps eller liknande roll
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av containerteknik och Kubernetes i produktionsmiljö
* Erfarenhet av OpenShift
* Erfarenhet av att sätta upp och underhålla CI/CD-pipelines
* Gillar ny teknik och förstår fördelar, nackdelar samt utmaningar med detta
* Förmåga att uttrycka dig väl på svenska i tal och skrift



  





**Det är dessutom meriterande om du har** 



* Certifieringar inom Kubernetes och/eller OpenShift
* Erfarenhet av säkerhetsarbete inom containerplattformar
* Hanterat mesh-lösningar för säker kommunikation, trafikstyrning och övervakning av mikrotjänster
* Erfarenhet av Kafka
* Erfarenhet av Java
* Erfarenhet av Istio service mesh
* Erfarenhet av Apache Camel K
* Erfarenhet av offentlig sektor



  





**Bra att veta** 




 Anställningen är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid som inleds med provanställning i sex månader. Du utgår ifrån kontoret på Västerbroplan i Stockholm, men har möjlighet att arbeta på distans upp till 2 dagar i veckan. Våren 2027 flyttar vi till Solna Strand. Din tjänstetitel blir systemtekniker och din placering är på Enheten för automatiska flöden på Digitaliseringsavdelningen.
 



 När du ansöker får du besvara ett antal urvalsfrågor som är kopplade till kravprofilen i annonsen.
 



  





 Dina svar används som en del i urvalsarbetet och kan avgöra om du går vidare i rekryteringsprocessen eller inte. Det är därför viktigt att du svarar så utförligt och tydligt som möjligt. Vi använder inte det personliga brevet vid urvalet, därför bifogar du endast ditt CV
 



  





 Om du har frågor om tjänsten, kontakta enhetschef Anastasia Nyman. Anastasia.nyman@socialstyrelsen.se. Vid frågor om rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta personalspecialist Klara Renberg, klara.renberg@socialstyrelsen.se. Facklig företrädare för SACO-S är Isabelle Ålander, isabelle.alander@socialstyrelsen.se Facklig företrädare för ST/OFR är Anders Nordlund, anders.nordlund@socialstyrelsen.se Samtliga nås på telefonnummer 075-247 30 00.
 



  





 Har du skyddad identitet? Kontakta angiven personalspecialist ovan.
 



  





 Välkommen med din ansökan senast den 20 mars.

title: QA Engineer - Client & Platform
description:
**A Bit About Us**
 Telenor Nordics is consolidating the
 **TV service** 
 and creating a unified Nordic customer experience, with seamless access across TV boxes and mobile platforms.
 **Telenor TV** 
 is one of the largest entertainment services in Norway and the Nordics, offering a wide range of features and connecting to numerous content providers, including Netflix, HBO, Viaplay, Apple TV, YouTube, TV2, and NRK. The service is central to
 **Telenor’s digital strategy in the Nordics** 
 and is continuously evolving to provide reliable streaming experiences for millions of users.
   

  

**How We Work**
 You will join the
 **Nordic TV & Streaming department** 
 , part of a TV tribe that works across all parts of Telenor involved in delivering TV services. The team includes colleagues from
 **product, development, UX, operations, and external suppliers** 
 . Work is done in an
 **agile environment** 
 , with collaboration focused on testing and improving TV and streaming systems. Clear processes and reliable delivery are priorities, with each team member contributing to the team’s work.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 You will
 **plan, design, and execute functional and non-functional tests** 
 and develop and maintain test scenarios, automation scripts, and tools. Responsibilities include verifying requirements, managing cases and issues in
 **Jira** 
 , and testing clients such as Set‑Top Boxes, tablets, Apple, Apple TV, Android, and Web. You will also test
 **backend systems** 
 , covering functions, business logic and order flows.
   

  

**Tasks include:**
* Documenting test results, reporting defects, and retesting fixes
* Presenting risk assessments before releases
* Assisting with incident and problem analysis
* Supporting the tribe and squads in planning and executing QA tasks
* Contributing to QA practices across the team


**What We Are Looking For In An Application**
 A
 **bachelor’s degree or higher in IT** 
 , or relevant experience that compensates for formal education. Training can be offered to candidates with a
 **strong interest in QA** 
 . Ideally, you have
 **experience as a tester or test lead** 
 and have collaborated across
 **technical and non-technical teams** 
 . You should have knowledge of
 **IT and service platform architecture** 
 and the ability to produce
 **documentation, interface descriptions, requirements, and sequence diagrams** 
 . Strong English skills are required, both written and verbal, as Telenor use English as corporate language.
   

  

**Bonus qualifications:**
* Experience with AI-assisted automated testing
* Programming background
* Knowledge of IT security
* Familiarity with TV and streaming technologies
* Competence in client applications and home network technology


**Who are you?**
 You enjoy working with systems, applications, and their interactions. You are collaborative, systematic, and detail oriented. You stay updated on new technologies and are motivated by understanding customer needs and working with product, marketing, and UX teams.
   

  

**Why should you choose us?**
 You will be part of Norway’s largest TV provider, contributing to an important strategic area for Telenor. The role offers varied tasks across disciplines and the chance to work with highly qualified and motivated colleagues.
   

  

 We offer a
 **hybrid way of working with flexibility** 
 , along with opportunities for professional development and long-term career growth. At Telenor, you’ll play a key role in keeping one of our most important customer offerings running smoothly during a critical period. You’ll work with experienced teams across the Nordics, have real responsibility, and make decisions that directly impact customers’ everyday TV and streaming experience.
   

  

 You’ll join an environment that values
 **clarity, trust, and pragmatic execution** 
 - with room to make your mark.
   

  

**Practical Information**
**Application review:** 
 Applications are reviewed on an
 **ongoing basis** 
 .
   

  

**Location:** 
 This position will be based in one of our Telenor offices in the Nordic region: Norway, Sweden or Finland.
   

  

**Contact:** 
 If you have any questions, contact Thomas Holst‑Jæger at thomas.holst‑jaeger@telenor.no. Please note that we cannot accept applications via email.
   

  

**Background checks:** 
 As part of Telenor’s policy, we conduct background checks on final candidates for all recruitments through Semac AS.
   

  

*Telenor Nordics, a business area within the Telenor Group, connects more than 12 million customers across Denmark, Sweden, Finland, and Norway. Our 7,000 Nordic employees are dedicated to building and securing some of the world’s most advanced mobile networks, delivering reliable connectivity, relevant services, and customer excellence. We are committed to being the place where talent thrive and grow as part of a future-ready and empowered workforce, collaborating across the Nordics to create value.*

title: Software Design QA Manager
description:
**Software Design Quality Manager** 




  





**Location:** 
 Hybrid with proximity to one of the three office hubs
 



**Physical Office Hubs:** 
 Stockholm / London / Berlin
 



**Employment Type:** 
 Full-time
 



  





 We are seeking a People Lead for Software Design Quality Assurance to define, scale, and continuously improve software quality across a regulated medical device software ecosystem. This role is accountable for software design controls, SDLC quality systems, risk management, and audit-ready technical documentation spanning embedded software, applications, cloud platforms, SaaS, and AI/ML-enabled systems.
 



  





 You will work closely with software engineering, firmware, cloud, DevOps, data, and product leadership to ensure software development is safe, compliant, efficient, and scalable. With foundational quality systems already in place, the emphasis is now on system-building, automation, and organizational scaling.
 



  





 This is a hands-on leadership role requiring strong regulatory expertise, an engineering mindset, and the ability to balance quality rigor with development velocity. You will initially manage a small team and grow a dedicated Software Design QA function over time.
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 



* Define and execute the software design QA strategy across all product areas, including SaMD, cloud-based platforms, and AI-enabled systems
* Own software design control processes, SDLC governance, and risk management aligned with global regulatory requirements
* Lead, mentor, and scale a high-performing Software Design QA team
* Maintain audit-ready Software Design History Files (DHFs), risk management files, V&V documentation, and SOUP documentation
* Establish and monitor SDLC quality KPIs and metrics to drive data-informed decisions
* Implement automation, digital tooling, and CI/CD-integrated quality gates to enable continuous compliance
* Collaborate with engineering and product teams on architecture reviews, hazard analysis, cybersecurity, and system-level design controls
* Ensure organizational readiness for regulatory audits and inspections
* Promote a strong culture of quality excellence across R&D while supporting rapid development and scale



  





**Required Skills & Experience** 



* 8+ years of experience in Software Design Quality within the medical device or digital health industry, including SaMD, cloud-based software, and AI/ML-enabled systems
* BSc or MSc in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Biomedical Engineering, or a related technical field
* Proven leadership experience building and managing QA teams, with strong mentoring and people development skills
* Deep expertise in software design controls and risk management for medical devices, with hands-on experience applying IEC 62304, IEC 82304, ISO 14971, EU MDR, and FDA 21 CFR Part 820/11
* Strong knowledge of medical device software, usability, quality, and cybersecurity standards (e.g., IEC 62366, ISO 13485, IEC 81001-5-1)
* Demonstrated ability to produce and maintain audit-ready software documentation, including DHFs and SOUP management
* Experience implementing automated and DevOps-integrated QA processes, CI/CD quality gates, and modern QA tooling
* Strong cross-functional collaboration skills within Agile software development environments
* Analytical and strategic mindset with the ability to balance risk, compliance, quality, and development velocity
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English



  





 Nice to Have
 


* Experience with
 **AI/ML validation and verification** 
 for medical devices
* Background scaling
 **cloud-native QA functions** 
 in high-growth or agile organizations
* Strong knowledge of
 **cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)** 
 and SaaS regulatory considerations
* Experience with
 **containerization, infrastructure-as-code, and cloud-native architectures**
* Experience working with
 **Notified Bodies or regulatory authorities** 
 for software-driven medical devices



  





**Apply** 




 Ready to make your mark? Don’t hesitate to apply today as first round interviews will be arranged within a week.

title: Fullstack Developer - Python
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Strong skills in PythonSolid backend development experience in production systems
* Experience building and maintaining APIs, integrations, and database logic
* Good understanding of secure coding and development practices
* Working according to established security routines and policies
* Experience with Git and modern development workflows (CI/CD)
* Comfortable working in console-based and Unix environments


**Meritorious**
* Experience with PHP
* JavaScript and frontend libraries (e.g., Nodejs, Vue)


**Application deadline:** 
 27-02-2026
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: AI Ops Engineer - Finance
description:
**TL;DR** 
 — You'll make sure no one at Lovable spends time on anything AI can do. We're defining how AI-native companies operate internally, across Product, GTM, and G&A. You'll own the systems that let a 200-person team move like a 2,000-person company: workflow automations, internal AI tools, data enrichment pipelines.
